192 void bionic::initialize_pseudo_items( bool create_weapon )
193 {
194  bionic_data bid( info() );
195 
196  bool inherit_use_bionic_power = bid.has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER );
197  toggled_pseudo_items.clear();
198  passive_pseudo_items.clear();
199 
200  if( bid.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) || bid.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
201  if( create_weapon && !id->fake_weapon.is_empty() && id->fake_weapon.is_valid() ) {
202  item new_weapon = item( id->fake_weapon );
203  install_weapon( new_weapon, true );
204  } else {
205  update_weapon_flags();
206  }
207  } else if( bid.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
208  for( const itype_id &id : bid.toggled_pseudo_items ) {
209  if( !id.is_empty() && id.is_valid() ) {
210  toggled_pseudo_items.emplace_back( id );
211  }
212  }
213  }
214  //integrated armor uses pseudo item structure to be convenient but these should be visible in inventory
215  for( const itype_id &id : bid.passive_pseudo_items ) {
216  if( !id.is_empty() && id.is_valid() ) {
217  item pseudo( id );
218  if( !pseudo.has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED ) ) {
219  pseudo.set_flag( flag_PSEUDO );
220  }
221  passive_pseudo_items.emplace_back( pseudo );
222  }
223  }
224 
225  if( inherit_use_bionic_power ) {
226  for( item &pseudo : passive_pseudo_items ) {
227  pseudo.set_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER );
228  }
229 
230  for( item &pseudo : toggled_pseudo_items ) {
231  pseudo.set_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER );
232  }
233  }
234 }
235 
236 void bionic::update_weapon_flags()
237 {
238  if( has_weapon() ) {
239  if( id->has_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER ) ) {
240  weapon.set_flag( flag_USES_BIONIC_POWER );
241  }
242  weapon.set_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
243  }
244 }

260 std::vector<bodypart_id> get_occupied_bodyparts( const bionic_id &bid )
261 {
262  std::vector<bodypart_id> parts;
263  for( const std::pair<const string_id<body_part_type>, size_t> &element : bid->occupied_bodyparts ) {
264  if( element.second > 0 ) {
265  parts.push_back( element.first.id() );
266  }
267  }
268  return parts;
269 }

293 static social_modifiers load_bionic_social_mods( const JsonObject &jo )
294 {
295  social_modifiers ret;
296  jo.read( "lie", ret.lie );
297  jo.read( "persuade", ret.persuade );
298  jo.read( "intimidate", ret.intimidate );
299  return ret;

302 void bionic_data::load( const JsonObject &jsobj, const std::string &src )
303 {
304 
305  mandatory( jsobj, was_loaded, "id", id );
306  mandatory( jsobj, was_loaded, "name", name );
307  mandatory( jsobj, was_loaded, "description", description );
308 
309  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "cant_remove_reason", cant_remove_reason );
310  // uses assign because optional doesn't handle loading units as strings
311  assign( jsobj, "react_cost", power_over_time, false, 0_kJ );
312  assign( jsobj, "capacity", capacity, false );
313  assign( jsobj, "act_cost", power_activate, false, 0_kJ );
314  assign( jsobj, "deact_cost", power_deactivate, false, 0_kJ );
315  assign( jsobj, "trigger_cost", power_trigger, false, 0_kJ );
316 
317  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "time", charge_time, 0_turns );
318 
319  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "flags", flags );
320  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "active_flags", active_flags );
321  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "inactive_flags", inactive_flags );
322 
323  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "fuel_efficiency", fuel_efficiency, 0 );
324  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "passive_fuel_efficiency", passive_fuel_efficiency, 0 );
325 
326  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "passive_pseudo_items", passive_pseudo_items );
327  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "toggled_pseudo_items", toggled_pseudo_items );
328  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "fake_weapon", fake_weapon, itype_id() );
329  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "installable_weapon_flags", installable_weapon_flags );
330 
331  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "spell_on_activation", spell_on_activate );
332 
333  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "exothermic_power_gen", exothermic_power_gen );
334  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "power_gen_emission", power_gen_emission );
335  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "coverage_power_gen_penalty", coverage_power_gen_penalty );
336  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "is_remote_fueled", is_remote_fueled );
337 
338  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "known_ma_styles", ma_styles );
339  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "learned_spells", learned_spells );
340  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "learned_proficiencies", proficiencies );
341  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "canceled_mutations", canceled_mutations );
342  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "mutation_conflicts", mutation_conflicts );
343  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "give_mut_on_removal", give_mut_on_removal );
344  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "included_bionics", included_bionics );
345  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "included", included );
346  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "upgraded_bionic", upgraded_bionic );
347  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "required_bionic", required_bionic );
348  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "fuel_options", fuel_opts );
349  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "activated_on_install", activated_on_install, false );
350 
351  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "available_upgrades", available_upgrades );
352 
353  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "installation_requirement", installation_requirement );
354 
355  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "dupes_allowed", dupes_allowed, false );
356 
357  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "auto_deactivates", autodeactivated_bionics );
358 
359  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "activated_close_ui", activated_close_ui, false );
360 
361  optional( jsobj, was_loaded, "deactivated_close_ui", deactivated_close_ui, false );
362 
363  for( JsonValue jv : jsobj.get_array( "activated_eocs" ) ) {
364  activated_eocs.push_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, src ) );
365  }
366 
367  for( JsonValue jv : jsobj.get_array( "processed_eocs" ) ) {
368  processed_eocs.push_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, src ) );
369  }
370 
371  for( JsonValue jv : jsobj.get_array( "deactivated_eocs" ) ) {
372  deactivated_eocs.push_back( effect_on_conditions::load_inline_eoc( jv, src ) );
373  }
374 
375  int enchant_num = 0;
376  for( JsonValue jv : jsobj.get_array( "enchantments" ) ) {
377  std::string enchant_name = "INLINE_ENCH_" + name + "_" + std::to_string( enchant_num++ );
378  enchantments.push_back( enchantment::load_inline_enchantment( jv, src, enchant_name ) );
379  }
380 
381  if( jsobj.has_array( "encumbrance" ) ) {
382  // clear data first so that copy-from can override it
383  encumbrance.clear();
384  for( JsonArray ja : jsobj.get_array( "encumbrance" ) ) {
385  encumbrance.emplace( bodypart_str_id( ja.get_string( 0 ) ),
386  ja.get_int( 1 ) );
387  }
388  }
389  if( jsobj.has_array( "occupied_bodyparts" ) ) {
390  // clear data first so that copy-from can override it
391  occupied_bodyparts.clear();
392  for( JsonArray ja : jsobj.get_array( "occupied_bodyparts" ) ) {
393  occupied_bodyparts.emplace( bodypart_str_id( ja.get_string( 0 ) ),
394  ja.get_int( 1 ) );
395  }
396  }
397  if( jsobj.has_array( "env_protec" ) ) {
398  // clear data first so that copy-from can override it
399  env_protec.clear();
400  for( JsonArray ja : jsobj.get_array( "env_protec" ) ) {
401  env_protec.emplace( bodypart_str_id( ja.get_string( 0 ) ), ja.get_int( 1 ) );
402  }
403  }
404  if( jsobj.has_array( "protec" ) ) {
405  protec.clear();
406  for( JsonArray ja : jsobj.get_array( "protec" ) ) {
407  protec.emplace( bodypart_str_id( ja.get_string( 0 ) ),
408  load_resistances_instance( ja.get_object( 1 ) ) );
409  }
410  }
411  if( jsobj.has_object( "social_modifiers" ) ) {
412  JsonObject sm = jsobj.get_object( "social_modifiers" );
413  social_mods = load_bionic_social_mods( sm );
414  }
415 
416  activated = has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) ) ||
417  has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) ||
418  power_activate > 0_kJ ||
419  spell_on_activate ||
420  charge_time > 0_turns;
421 
422  if( has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_FAULTY" ) ) ) ) {
423  faulty_bionics.push_back( id );
424  }
425 
426  if( has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) && power_activate != 0_kJ ) {
427  debugmsg( "Bionic %s attribute power_activate is ignored due to BIONIC_GUN flag.", id.c_str() );
428  }
429 }

435  }

443 std::map<bionic_id, bionic_id> bionic_data::migrations;
444 
445 void bionic_data::load_bionic_migration( const JsonObject &jo, const std::string_view )
446 {
447  const bionic_id from( jo.get_string( "from" ) );
448  const bionic_id to = jo.has_string( "to" )
449  ? bionic_id( jo.get_string( "to" ) )
450  : bionic_id::NULL_ID();
451  migrations.emplace( from, to );
452  // if delete bionics id before migration, cant migration
453  // if key showed once, and its null, delete previous null one
454  auto iter = migrations.find( from );
455  if( iter != migrations.end() && ( *iter ).second.is_null() ) {
456  migrations.erase( iter );
457  }
458 }

462  bionic_factory.finalize();
463 }

470 void bionic_data::check_bionic_consistency()
471 {
472  for( const bionic_data &bio : get_all() ) {
473 
474  if( !bio.installation_requirement.is_empty() && !bio.installation_requirement.is_valid() ) {
475  debugmsg( "Bionic %s uses undefined requirement_id %s", bio.id.c_str(),
476  bio.installation_requirement.c_str() );
477  }
478  if( bio.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) && bio.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
479  debugmsg( "Bionic %s specified as both gun and weapon bionic", bio.id.c_str() );
480  }
481  if( ( bio.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) || bio.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) &&
482  bio.fake_weapon.is_empty() ) {
483  debugmsg( "Bionic %s specified as gun or weapon bionic is missing its fake_weapon id",
484  bio.id.c_str() );
485  }
486  if( bio.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) && !bio.has_flag( flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
487  debugmsg( "Bionic \"%s\" specified as weapon bionic is not flagged as \"BIONIC_TOGGLED\"",
488  bio.id.c_str() );
489  }
490 
491  for( const itype_id &pseudo : bio.passive_pseudo_items ) {
492  if( pseudo.is_empty() ) {
493  debugmsg( "Bionic \"%s\" has an empty passive_pseudo_item",
494  bio.id.c_str() );
495  } else if( !item::type_is_defined( pseudo ) ) {
496  debugmsg( "Bionic \"%s\" has unknown passive_pseudo_item \"%s\"",
497  bio.id.c_str(), pseudo.c_str() );
498  }
499  }
500 
501  for( const itype_id &pseudo : bio.toggled_pseudo_items ) {
502  if( pseudo.is_empty() ) {
503  debugmsg( "Bionic %s has an empty toggled_pseudo_item",
504  bio.id.c_str() );
505  } else if( !item::type_is_defined( pseudo ) ) {
506  debugmsg( "Bionic \"%s\" has unknown toggled_pseudo_item \"%s\"",
507  bio.id.c_str(), pseudo.c_str() );
508  }
509  }
510  for( const trait_id &mid : bio.mutation_conflicts ) {
511  if( !mid.is_valid() ) {
512  debugmsg( "Bionic %s conflicts with undefined mutation %s", bio.id.c_str(), mid.c_str() );
513  }
514  }
515  for( const trait_id &mid : bio.canceled_mutations ) {
516  if( !mid.is_valid() ) {
517  debugmsg( "Bionic %s cancels undefined mutation %s", bio.id.c_str(), mid.c_str() );
518  }
519  }
520  for( const enchantment_id &eid : bio.id->enchantments ) {
521  if( !eid.is_valid() ) {
522  debugmsg( "Bionic %s uses undefined enchantment %s", bio.id.c_str(), eid.c_str() );
523  }
524  }
525  for( const bionic_id &bid : bio.included_bionics ) {
526  if( !bid.is_valid() ) {
527  debugmsg( "Bionic %s includes undefined bionic %s",
528  bio.id.c_str(), bid.c_str() );
529  }
530  if( !bid->occupied_bodyparts.empty() ) {
531  debugmsg( "Bionic %s (included by %s) consumes slots, those should be part of the containing bionic instead.",
532  bid.c_str(), bio.id.c_str() );
533  }
534  }
535  for( const bionic_id &bid : bio.autodeactivated_bionics ) {
536  if( !bid.is_valid() ) {
537  debugmsg( "Bionic \"%s\" has auto_deactivated bionic with invalid id \"%s\"", bio.id.c_str(),
538  bid.c_str() );
539  }
540  }
541  if( bio.upgraded_bionic ) {
542  if( bio.upgraded_bionic == bio.id ) {
543  debugmsg( "Bionic %s is upgraded with itself", bio.id.c_str() );
544  } else if( !bio.upgraded_bionic.is_valid() ) {
545  debugmsg( "Bionic %s upgrades undefined bionic %s",
546  bio.id.c_str(), bio.upgraded_bionic.c_str() );
547  }
548  }
549  if( bio.required_bionic ) {
550  if( bio.required_bionic == bio.id ) {
551  debugmsg( "Bionic %s requires itself as a prerequisite for installation", bio.id.c_str() );
552  } else if( !bio.required_bionic.is_valid() ) {
553  debugmsg( "Bionic %s requires undefined bionic %s",
554  bio.id.c_str(), bio.required_bionic.c_str() );
555  }
556  }
557  if( !item::type_is_defined( bio.itype() ) && !bio.included ) {
558  debugmsg( "Bionic %s has no defined item version", bio.id.c_str() );
559  }
560  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, resistances> &bprot : bio.protec ) {
561  for( const std::pair<const damage_type_id, float> &dt : bprot.second.resist_vals ) {
562  if( !dt.first.is_valid() ) {
563  debugmsg( "Invalid protection type \"%s\" for bionic %s", dt.first.c_str(), bio.id.c_str() );
564  }
565  }
566  }
567  }
568 }
569 
570 bionic_data::bionic_data() : name( no_translation( "bad bionic" ) ),
571  description( no_translation( "This bionic was not set up correctly, this is a bug" ) )
572 {
573 }
574 
575 void npc::discharge_cbm_weapon( bool fired, bool stow_real_weapon )
576 {
577  if( !is_using_bionic_weapon() ) {
578  return;
579  }
580 
581  item *pseudo_gun = get_wielded_item().get_item();
582  if( pseudo_gun != nullptr ) {
583  if( fired ) {
584  mod_power_level( -pseudo_gun->get_gun_bionic_drain() );
585  }
586  } else {
587  debugmsg( "NPC tried to use a non-existent bionic gun with UID %d", weapon_bionic_uid );
588  }
589 
590  set_wielded_item( real_weapon );
591  real_weapon = item();
592  weapon_bionic_uid = 0;
593 
594  item *real_weapon_ptr = get_wielded_item().get_item();
595  if( stow_real_weapon && real_weapon_ptr != nullptr ) {
596  stow_item( *real_weapon_ptr );
597  }
598 }
599 
600 void npc::deactivate_or_discharge_bionic_weapon( bool stow_real_weapon )
601 {
602  if( !is_using_bionic_weapon() ) {
603  return;
604  }
605 
606  std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
607  if( !bio_opt ) {
608  debugmsg( "NPC tried to use a non-existent gun bionic with UID %d", weapon_bionic_uid );
609  return;
610  }
611 
612  bionic &bio = **bio_opt;
613 
614  if( bio.powered ) {
615  deactivate_bionic( bio );
616  } else {
617  if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) ) {
618  discharge_cbm_weapon( false, stow_real_weapon );
619  }
620  }
621 }
622 
623 void npc::check_or_use_weapon_cbm( const bionic_id &cbm_id )
624 {
625  // if we're already using a bio_weapon, keep using it
626  if( is_using_bionic_weapon() ) {
627  return;
628  }
629  const float allowed_ratio = static_cast<int>( rules.cbm_reserve ) / 100.0f;
630  const units::energy free_power = get_power_level() - get_max_power_level() * allowed_ratio;
631  if( free_power <= 0_mJ ) {
632  return;
633  }
634 
635  int index = 0;
636  bool found = false;
637  for( bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
638  if( i.id == cbm_id && !i.powered ) {
639  found = true;
640  break;
641  }
642  index += 1;
643  }
644  if( !found ) {
645  return;
646  }
647  bionic &bio = ( *my_bionics )[index];
648 
649  item_location weapon = get_wielded_item();
650  const item &weap = weapon ? *weapon : null_item_reference();
651 
652  int ammo_count = weap.ammo_remaining( this );
653  const units::energy ups_drain = weap.get_gun_ups_drain();
654  if( ups_drain > 0_kJ ) {
655  ammo_count = units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( ammo_count ) ) / ups_drain;
656  }
657 
658  // the weapon value from `weapon_value` may be different from `npc_attack_rating`
659  // to avoid NPC infinitely switch weapon,
660  // only use bionic weapon when the ammo of wielded gun has been used up
661  bool ammo_used_up = !weap.is_gun() || ( ammo_count <= 0 && !can_reload_current() );
662  if( !ammo_used_up ) {
663  return;
664  }
665 
666  if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) ) {
667  if( !bio.has_weapon() ) {
668  debugmsg( "NPC tried to activate gun bionic \"%s\" without fake_weapon",
669  bio.info().id.str() );
670  return;
671  }
672 
673  const item cbm_weapon = bio.get_weapon();
674  bool not_allowed = !rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_guns ) ||
675  ( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_silent ) && !cbm_weapon.is_silent() );
676  if( is_player_ally() && not_allowed ) {
677  return;
678  }
679 
680  const int cbm_ammo = free_power / cbm_weapon.get_gun_energy_drain();
681 
682  if( weapon_value( weap, ammo_count ) < weapon_value( cbm_weapon, cbm_ammo ) ) {
683  if( real_weapon.is_null() ) {
684  // Prevent replacing real weapon when migrating saves
685  real_weapon = weap;
686  }
687  set_wielded_item( cbm_weapon );
688  weapon_bionic_uid = bio.get_uid();
689  }
690 
691  } else if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) && !weap.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) &&
692  free_power > bio.info().power_activate ) {
693 
694  if( !bio.has_weapon() ) {
695  debugmsg( "NPC tried to activate weapon bionic \"%s\" without fake_weapon",
696  bio.info().id.str() );
697  return;
698  }
699 
700  const item cbm_weapon = bio.get_weapon();
701 
702  if( weapon_value( weap, ammo_count ) < weapon_value( cbm_weapon, 0 ) ) {
703  if( is_armed() ) {
704  stow_item( *weapon );
705  }
706  add_msg_if_player_sees( pos(), m_info, _( "%s activates their %s." ),
707  disp_name(), bio.info().name );
708 
709  set_wielded_item( cbm_weapon );
710  mod_power_level( -bio.info().power_activate );
711  bio.powered = true;
712  weapon_bionic_uid = bio.get_uid();
713  }
714  }
715 }
716 
717 // Why put this in a Big Switch? Why not let bionics have pointers to
718 // functions, much like monsters and items?
719 //
720 // Well, because like diseases, which are also in a Big Switch, bionics don't
721 // share functions....
722 bool Character::activate_bionic( bionic &bio, bool eff_only, bool *close_bionics_ui )
723 {
724  const bool mounted = is_mounted();
725  if( bio.incapacitated_time > 0_turns ) {
726  add_msg( m_info, _( "Your %s is shorting out and can't be activated." ),
727  bio.info().name );
728  return false;
729  }
730 
731  // eff_only means only do the effect without messing with stats or displaying messages
732  if( !eff_only ) {
733  if( bio.powered ) {
734  // It's already on!
735  return false;
736  }
737  if( !enough_power_for( bio.id ) ) {
738  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have the power to activate your %s." ),
739  bio.info().name );
740  return false;
741  }
742 
743  const bionic_fuels result = bionic_fuel_check( bio, true );
744  if( !result.can_be_on ) {
745  return false;
746  }
747 
748  if( !bio.activate_spell( *this ) ) {
749  // the spell this bionic uses was unable to be cast
750  return false;
751  }
752 
753  // We can actually activate now, do activation-y things
754  mod_power_level( -bio.info().power_activate );
755 
756  bio.powered = bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) || bio.info().charge_time > 0_turns;
757 
758  if( bio.info().charge_time > 0_turns ) {
759  bio.charge_timer = bio.info().charge_time;
760  }
761  if( !bio.id->enchantments.empty() ) {
762  recalculate_enchantment_cache();
763  }
764  }
765 
766  auto add_msg_activate = [&]() {
767  if( !eff_only ) {
768  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You activate your %s." ), bio.info().name );
769  }
770  };
771  auto refund_power = [&]() {
772  if( !eff_only ) {
773  mod_power_level( bio.info().power_activate );
774  }
775  };
776 
777  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : bio.id->activated_eocs ) {
778  dialogue d( get_talker_for( *this ), nullptr );
779  write_var_value( var_type::context, "npctalk_var_act_cost", &d,
780  units::to_millijoule( bio.info().power_activate ) );
781  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
782  eoc->activate( d );
783  } else {
784  debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for a bionic activation. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the bionic being activated), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this bionic with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." );
785  }
786  }
787 
788  item tmp_item;
789  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
790  map &here = get_map();
791  // On activation effects go here
792  if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_GUN ) ) {
793  if( !bio.has_weapon() ) {
794  debugmsg( "tried to activate gun bionic \"%s\" without fake_weapon",
795  bio.info().id.str() );
796  return false;
797  }
798  if( bio.get_weapon().get_gun_bionic_drain() > get_power_level() ) {
799  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You need at least %s of bionic power to fire the %s!" ),
800  units::display( bio.get_weapon().get_gun_bionic_drain() ), bio.get_weapon().tname() );
801  return false;
802  }
803 
804  add_msg_activate();
805  if( close_bionics_ui ) {
806  *close_bionics_ui = true;
807  }
808  avatar_action::fire_ranged_bionic( player_character, bio.get_weapon() );
809  } else if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
810  if( !bio.has_weapon() ) {
811  debugmsg( "tried to activate weapon bionic \"%s\" without fake_weapon",
812  bio.info().id.str() );
813  refund_power();
814  bio.powered = false;
815  return false;
816  }
817 
818  if( weapon.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ) {
819  if( get_weapon_bionic_uid() ) {
820  if( std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( get_weapon_bionic_uid() ) ) {
821  if( deactivate_bionic( **bio_opt, eff_only ) ) {
822  // restore state and try again
823  refund_power();
824  bio.powered = false;
825  // note: deep recursion is not possible, as `deactivate_bionic` won't return true second time
826  return activate_bionic( bio, eff_only, close_bionics_ui );
827  }
828  } else {
829  debugmsg( "Can't find currently activated weapon bionic with UID %d", get_weapon_bionic_uid() );
830  weapon_bionic_uid = 0;
831  set_wielded_item( item() );
832  refund_power();
833  bio.powered = false;
834  return false;
835  }
836  }
837 
838  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Deactivate your %s first!" ), weapon.tname() );
839  refund_power();
840  bio.powered = false;
841  return false;
842  }
843 
844  if( !weapon.is_null() ) {
845  const std::string query = string_format( _( "Stop wielding %s?" ), weapon.tname() );
846  if( !dispose_item( item_location( *this, &weapon ), query ) ) {
847  refund_power();
848  bio.powered = false;
849  return false;
850  }
851  }
852 
853  add_msg_activate();
854 
855  set_wielded_item( bio.get_weapon() );
856  get_wielded_item()->invlet = '#';
857  weapon_bionic_uid = bio.get_uid();
858  } else if( bio.id == bio_evap ) {
859  if( player_character.is_underwater() ) {
860  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
861  _( "There's a lot of water around you already, no need to use your %s." ), bio.info().name );
862  bio.powered = false;
863  return false;
864  }
865 
866  add_msg_activate();
867  const w_point weatherPoint = *get_weather().weather_precise;
868  int humidity = get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
869  g->is_sheltered( player_character.pos() ) );
870  // thirst units = 5 mL
871  int water_available = std::lround( humidity * 3.0 / 100.0 );
872  if( water_available == 0 ) {
873  bio.powered = false;
874  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "There is not enough humidity in the air for your %s to function." ),
875  bio.info().name );
876  return false;
877  } else if( water_available == 1 ) {
878  add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
879  _( "Your %s issues a low humidity warning. Efficiency will be reduced." ),
880  bio.info().name );
881  }
882  } else if( bio.id == bio_cqb ) {
883  add_msg_activate();
884  const avatar *you = as_avatar();
885  if( you && !martial_arts_data->pick_style( *you ) ) {
886  bio.powered = false;
887  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You change your mind and turn it off." ) );
888  return false;
889  }
890  } else if( bio.id == bio_resonator ) {
891  add_msg_activate();
892  //~Sound of a bionic sonic-resonator shaking the area
893  sounds::sound( pos(), 30, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "VRRRRMP!" ), false, "bionic",
894  static_cast<std::string>( bio_resonator ) );
895  for( const tripoint &bashpoint : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
896  here.bash( bashpoint, 110 );
897  // Multibash effect, so that doors &c will fall
898  here.bash( bashpoint, 110 );
899  here.bash( bashpoint, 110 );
900  }
901 
902  mod_moves( -100 );
903  } else if( bio.id == bio_teleport ) {
904  if( mounted ) {
905  refund_power();
906  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You cannot activate %s while mounted." ), bio.info().name );
907  return false;
908  }
909  add_msg_activate();
910 
911  teleport::teleport( *this );
912  mod_moves( -100 );
913  } else if( bio.id == bio_blood_anal ) {
914  add_msg_activate();
915  conduct_blood_analysis();
916  } else if( bio.id == bio_torsionratchet ) {
917  add_msg_activate();
918  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your torsion ratchet locks onto your joints." ) );
919  } else if( bio.id == bio_jointservo ) {
920  add_msg_activate();
921  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can now run faster, assisted by joint servomotors." ) );
922  } else if( bio.id == bio_lighter ) {
923  const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Start a fire where?" ) );
924  if( pnt && here.is_flammable( *pnt ) ) {
925  add_msg_activate();
926  here.add_field( *pnt, fd_fire, 1 );
927  if( has_trait( trait_PYROMANIA ) ) {
928  add_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_STARTFIRE, 5, 10, 3_hours, 2_hours );
929  rem_morale( MORALE_PYROMANIA_NOFIRE );
930  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You happily light a fire." ) );
931  }
932  mod_moves( -100 );
933  } else {
934  refund_power();
935  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's nothing to light there." ) );
936  return false;
937  }
938  } else if( bio.id == bio_geiger ) {
939  add_msg_activate();
940  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your radiation level: %d" ), get_rad() );
941  } else if( bio.id == bio_radscrubber ) {
942  add_msg_activate();
943  if( get_rad() > 4 ) {
944  mod_rad( -5 );
945  } else {
946  set_rad( 0 );
947  }
948  } else if( bio.id == bio_emp ) {
949  if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Create an EMP where?" ) ) ) {
950  add_msg_activate();
951  explosion_handler::emp_blast( *pnt );
952  mod_moves( -100 );
953  } else {
954  refund_power();
955  return false;
956  }
957  } else if( bio.id == bio_water_extractor ) {
958  bool no_target = true;
959  bool extracted = false;
960  for( item &it : here.i_at( pos() ) ) {
961  static const units::volume volume_per_water_charge = 500_ml;
962  if( it.is_corpse() ) {
963  const int avail = it.get_var( "remaining_water", it.volume() / volume_per_water_charge );
964  if( avail > 0 ) {
965  no_target = false;
966  if( query_yn( _( "Extract water from the %s" ),
967  colorize( it.tname(), it.color_in_inventory() ) ) ) {
968  item water( itype_water_clean, calendar::turn, avail );
969  water.set_item_temperature( it.temperature );
970  if( liquid_handler::consume_liquid( water ) ) {
971  add_msg_activate();
972  extracted = true;
973  it.set_var( "remaining_water", static_cast<int>( water.charges ) );
974  }
975  break;
976  }
977  }
978  }
979  }
980  if( no_target ) {
981  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "There is no suitable corpse on this tile." ) );
982  }
983  if( !extracted ) {
984  refund_power();
985  return false;
986  }
987  } else if( bio.id == bio_magnet ) {
988  add_msg_activate();
989  static const std::set<material_id> affected_materials =
990  { material_iron, material_steel, material_lc_steel, material_mc_steel, material_hc_steel, material_ch_steel, material_qt_steel, material_budget_steel };
991  // Remember all items that will be affected, then affect them
992  // Don't "snowball" by affecting some items multiple times
993  std::vector<std::pair<item, tripoint>> affected;
994  const units::mass weight_cap = weight_capacity();
995  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 10 ) ) {
996  if( p == pos() || !here.has_items( p ) || here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, p ) ) {
997  continue;
998  }
999 
1000  map_stack stack = here.i_at( p );
1001  for( auto it = stack.begin(); it != stack.end(); it++ ) {
1002  if( it->weight() < weight_cap &&
1003  it->made_of_any( affected_materials ) ) {
1004  affected.emplace_back( *it, p );
1005  stack.erase( it );
1006  break;
1007  }
1008  }
1009  }
1010 
1011  for( const std::pair<item, tripoint> &pr : affected ) {
1012  projectile proj;
1013  proj.speed = 50;
1014  proj.impact = damage_instance();
1015  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type
1016  proj.impact.add_damage( STATIC( damage_type_id( "bash" ) ), pr.first.weight() / 250_gram );
1017  // make the projectile stop one tile short to prevent hitting the player
1018  proj.range = rl_dist( pr.second, pos() ) - 1;
1019  proj.proj_effects = {{ "NO_ITEM_DAMAGE", "DRAW_AS_LINE", "NO_DAMAGE_SCALING", "JET" }};
1020 
1021  dealt_projectile_attack dealt = projectile_attack(
1022  proj, pr.second, pos(), dispersion_sources{ 0 }, this );
1023  here.add_item_or_charges( dealt.end_point, pr.first );
1024  }
1025 
1026  mod_moves( -100 );
1027  } else if( bio.id == bio_lockpick ) {
1028  if( !is_avatar() ) {
1029  return false;
1030  }
1031  std::optional<tripoint> target = lockpick_activity_actor::select_location( player_character );
1032  if( target.has_value() ) {
1033  add_msg_activate();
1034  assign_activity( lockpick_activity_actor::use_bionic( here.getabs( *target ) ) );
1035  if( close_bionics_ui ) {
1036  *close_bionics_ui = true;
1037  }
1038  } else {
1039  refund_power();
1040  return false;
1041  }
1042  } else if( bio.id == bio_flashbang ) {
1043  add_msg_activate();
1044  explosion_handler::flashbang( pos(), true );
1045  mod_moves( -100 );
1046  } else if( bio.id == bio_shockwave ) {
1047  add_msg_activate();
1048  explosion_handler::shockwave( pos(), 3, 4, 2, 8, true );
1049  add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You unleash a powerful shockwave!" ) );
1050  mod_moves( -100 );
1051  } else if( bio.id == bio_meteorologist ) {
1052  add_msg_activate();
1053  // Calculate local wind power
1054  int vehwindspeed = 0;
1055  if( optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
1056  // vehicle velocity in mph
1057  vehwindspeed = std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity / 100 );
1058  }
1059  const oter_id &cur_om_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( global_omt_location() );
1060  /* cache g->get_temperature( player location ) since it is used twice. No reason to recalc */
1061  weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
1062  const units::temperature player_local_temp = weather.get_temperature( player_character.pos() );
1063  const int windpower = get_local_windpower( weather.windspeed + vehwindspeed,
1064  cur_om_ter, get_location(), weather.winddirection, g->is_sheltered( pos() ) );
1065  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Temperature: %s." ), print_temperature( player_local_temp ) );
1066  const w_point weatherPoint = *weather.weather_precise;
1067  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Relative Humidity: %s." ),
1068  print_humidity(
1069  get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
1070  g->is_sheltered( player_character.pos() ) ) ) );
1071  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Pressure: %s." ),
1072  print_pressure( static_cast<int>( weatherPoint.pressure ) ) );
1073  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Wind Speed: %.1f %s." ),
1074  convert_velocity( windpower * 100, VU_WIND ),
1075  velocity_units( VU_WIND ) );
1076  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Feels Like: %s." ),
1077  print_temperature( player_local_temp + get_local_windchill( weatherPoint.temperature,
1078  weatherPoint.humidity, windpower ) ) );
1079  std::string dirstring = get_dirstring( weather.winddirection );
1080  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Wind Direction: From the %s." ), dirstring );
1081  } else if( bio.id == bio_remote ) {
1082  add_msg_activate();
1083  int choice = uilist( _( "Perform which function:" ), {
1084  _( "Control vehicle" ), _( "RC radio" )
1085  } );
1086  if( choice >= 0 && choice <= 1 ) {
1087  item ctr;
1088  if( choice == 0 ) {
1089  ctr = item( "remotevehcontrol", calendar::turn_zero );
1090  } else {
1091  ctr = item( "radiocontrol", calendar::turn_zero );
1092  }
1093  ctr.charges = units::to_kilojoule( get_power_level() );
1094  int power_use = invoke_item( &ctr );
1095  mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( -power_use ) ) );
1096  bio.powered = ctr.active;
1097  } else {
1098  bio.powered = g->remoteveh() != nullptr || !get_value( "remote_controlling" ).empty();
1099  }
1100  } else if( bio.info().is_remote_fueled ) {
1101  std::vector<item *> cables = cache_get_items_with( flag_CABLE_SPOOL );
1102  bool has_cable = !cables.empty();
1103  bool free_cable = false;
1104  bool success = false;
1105  if( !has_cable ) {
1106  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1107  _( "You need a jumper cable connected to a power source to drain power from it." ) );
1108  } else {
1109  for( const item *cable : cables ) {
1110  if( cable->has_no_links() ) {
1111  free_cable = true;
1112  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::no_link, link_state::bio_cable ) ) {
1113  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1114  _( "You have a cable attached to your CBM but it also has to be connected to a power source." ) );
1115  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::solarpack, link_state::bio_cable ) ) {
1116  add_msg_activate();
1117  success = true;
1118  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1119  _( "You are attached to a solar pack. It will charge you if it's unfolded and in sunlight." ) );
1120  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::ups, link_state::bio_cable ) ) {
1121  add_msg_activate();
1122  success = true;
1123  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1124  _( "You are attached to a UPS. It will charge you if it has some juice in it." ) );
1125  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::bio_cable, link_state::vehicle_battery ) ||
1126  cable->link_has_states( link_state::bio_cable, link_state::vehicle_port ) ) {
1127  add_msg_activate();
1128  success = true;
1129  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1130  _( "You are attached to a vehicle. It will charge you if it has some juice in it." ) );
1131  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::solarpack, link_state::automatic ) ||
1132  cable->link_has_states( link_state::ups, link_state::automatic ) ) {
1133  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1134  _( "You have a cable attached to a portable power source, but you also need to connect it to your CBM." ) );
1135  } else if( cable->link_has_states( link_state::automatic, link_state::vehicle_battery ) ||
1136  cable->link_has_states( link_state::automatic, link_state::vehicle_port ) ) {
1137  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1138  _( "You have a cable attached to a vehicle, but you also need to connect it to your CBM." ) );
1139  }
1140  }
1141 
1142  if( free_cable && !success ) {
1143  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1144  _( "You have at least one free cable in your inventory that you could use to connect yourself." ) );
1145  }
1146  }
1147  if( !success ) {
1148  refund_power();
1149  bio.powered = false;
1150  return false;
1151  }
1152  } else {
1153  add_msg_activate();
1154 
1155  const std::vector<bionic_id> &deactivated_bionics = bio.info().autodeactivated_bionics;
1156  if( !deactivated_bionics.empty() ) {
1157  for( bionic &it : *my_bionics ) {
1158  if( std::find( deactivated_bionics.begin(), deactivated_bionics.end(),
1159  it.id ) != deactivated_bionics.end() ) {
1160  if( it.powered ) {
1161  it.powered = false;
1162  add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s automatically turn off." ), it.info().name );
1163  }
1164  }
1165  }
1166  }
1167  }
1168  bio_flag_cache.clear();
1169  // Recalculate stats (strength, mods from pain etc.) that could have been affected
1170  calc_encumbrance();
1171  reset();
1172 
1173  // Also reset crafting inventory cache if this bionic spawned a fake item
1174  if( bio.has_weapon() || !bio.info().passive_pseudo_items.empty() ||
1175  !bio.info().toggled_pseudo_items.empty() ) {
1176  invalidate_pseudo_items();
1177  invalidate_crafting_inventory();
1178  }
1179 
1180  return true;
1181 }

1183 ret_val<void> Character::can_deactivate_bionic( bionic &bio, bool eff_only ) const
1184 {
1185 
1186  if( bio.incapacitated_time > 0_turns ) {
1187  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Your %s is shorting out and can't be deactivated." ),
1188  bio.info().name );
1189  }
1190 
1191  if( !eff_only ) {
1192  if( !bio.powered ) {
1193  // It's already off!
1194  return ret_val<void>::make_failure();
1195  }
1196  if( !bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
1197  // It's a fire-and-forget bionic, we can't turn it off but have to wait for
1198  //it to run out of charge
1199  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You can't deactivate your %s manually!" ),
1200  bio.info().name );
1201  }
1202  if( get_power_level() < bio.info().power_deactivate ) {
1203  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "You don't have the power to deactivate your %s." ),
1204  bio.info().name );
1205  }
1206  }
1207 
1208  return ret_val<void>::make_success();
1209 }

1211 bool Character::deactivate_bionic( bionic &bio, bool eff_only )
1212 {
1213  const auto can_deactivate = can_deactivate_bionic( bio, eff_only );
1214  bio_flag_cache.clear();
1215  if( !can_deactivate.success() ) {
1216  if( !can_deactivate.str().empty() ) {
1217  add_msg( m_info, can_deactivate.str() );
1218  }
1219  return false;
1220  }
1221 
1222  // Just do the effect, no stat changing or messages
1223  if( !eff_only ) {
1224  //We can actually deactivate now, do deactivation-y things
1225  mod_power_level( -bio.info().power_deactivate );
1226  bio.powered = false;
1227  add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "You deactivate your %s." ), bio.info().name );
1228  }
1229 
1230  // Deactivation effects go here
1231 
1232  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : bio.id->deactivated_eocs ) {
1233  dialogue d( get_talker_for( *this ), nullptr );
1234  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
1235  eoc->activate( d );
1236  } else {
1237  debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for a bionic deactivation. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the bionic being activated), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this bionic with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." );
1238  }
1239  }
1240 
1241  if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
1242  if( bio.get_uid() == get_weapon_bionic_uid() ) {
1243  bio.set_weapon( *get_wielded_item() );
1244  add_msg_if_player( _( "You withdraw your %s." ), weapon.tname() );
1245  if( get_player_view().sees( pos() ) ) {
1246  if( male ) {
1247  add_msg_if_npc( m_info, _( "<npcname> withdraws his %s." ), weapon.tname() );
1248  } else {
1249  add_msg_if_npc( m_info, _( "<npcname> withdraws her %s." ), weapon.tname() );
1250  }
1251  }
1252  set_wielded_item( item() );
1253  weapon_bionic_uid = 0;
1254  cached_info.erase( "weapon_value" );
1255  }
1256  } else if( bio.id == bio_cqb ) {
1257  martial_arts_data->selected_style_check();
1258  } else if( bio.id == bio_remote ) {
1259  if( g->remoteveh() != nullptr && !has_active_item( itype_remotevehcontrol ) ) {
1260  g->setremoteveh( nullptr );
1261  } else if( !get_value( "remote_controlling" ).empty() &&
1262  !has_active_item( itype_radiocontrol ) ) {
1263  set_value( "remote_controlling", "" );
1264  }
1265  }
1266 
1267  // Recalculate stats (strength, mods from pain etc.) that could have been affected
1268  calc_encumbrance();
1269  reset();
1270  if( !bio.id->enchantments.empty() ) {
1271  recalculate_enchantment_cache();
1272  }
1273 
1274  // Also reset crafting inventory cache if this bionic spawned a fake item
1275  if( bio.has_weapon() || !bio.info().passive_pseudo_items.empty() ||
1276  !bio.info().toggled_pseudo_items.empty() ) {
1277  invalidate_pseudo_items();
1278  invalidate_crafting_inventory();
1279  }
1280 
1281  return true;
1282 }
1283 
1284 Character::bionic_fuels Character::bionic_fuel_check( bionic &bio,
1285  const bool start )
1286 {
1287  bionic_fuels result;
1288 
1289  const bool is_remote_fueled = bio.info().is_remote_fueled;
1290 
1291  if( bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() && !is_remote_fueled ) {
1292  return result;
1293  }
1294 
1295  if( is_remote_fueled ) {
1296  result.connected_vehicles = get_cable_vehicle();
1297  result.connected_solar = get_cable_solar();
1298  result.connected_fuel = get_cable_ups();
1299  } else {
1300  result.connected_fuel = get_bionic_fuels( bio.id );
1301  }
1302 
1303  int other_charges = 0;
1304  // There could be multiple fuels. But probably not. So we just check the first.
1305  bool is_perpetual = !bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() &&
1306  bio.id->fuel_opts.front()->get_fuel_data().is_perpetual_fuel;
1307  bool metabolism_powered = !bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() &&
1308  bio.id->fuel_opts.front() == fuel_type_metabolism;
1309 
1310  if( metabolism_powered ) {
1311  other_charges = std::max( 0.0f, get_stored_kcal() - 0.8f * get_healthy_kcal() );
1312  }
1313 
1314  if( !is_perpetual && !other_charges && result.connected_vehicles.empty() &&
1315  result.connected_solar.empty() &&
1316  result.connected_fuel.empty() ) {
1317  if( metabolism_powered ) {
1318  if( start ) {
1319  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
1320  _( "Your %s cannot be started because your calories are below safe levels." ),
1321  _( "<npcname>'s %s cannot be started because their calories are below safe levels." ),
1322  bio.info().name );
1323 
1324  } else if( bio.powered ) {
1325  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
1326  _( "Stored calories are below the safe threshold, your %s shuts down to preserve your health." ),
1327  _( "Stored calories are below the safe threshold, <npcname>'s %s shuts down to preserve their health." ),
1328  bio.info().name );
1329 
1330  bio.powered = false;
1331  deactivate_bionic( bio, true );
1332  }
1333  } else if( start ) {
1334  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s does not have enough fuel to start." ),
1335  _( "<npcname>'s %s does not have enough fuel to start." ),
1336  bio.info().name );
1337  } else if( bio.powered ) {
1338  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
1339  _( "Your %s runs out of fuel and turns off." ),
1340  _( "<npcname>'s %s runs out of fuel and turns off." ),
1341  bio.info().name );
1342  bio.powered = false;
1343  deactivate_bionic( bio, true );
1344  }
1345  result.can_be_on = false;
1346  }
1347 
1348  return result;
1349 }
1350 
1351 void Character::burn_fuel( bionic &bio )
1352 {
1353  float efficiency;
1354  if( !bio.powered ) {
1355  // Modifiers for passive bionic
1356  units::energy trickle = enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::POWER_TRICKLE,
1357  0_J );
1358  if( trickle != 0_J ) {
1359  mod_power_level( trickle );
1360  }
1361 
1362  efficiency = get_effective_efficiency( bio, bio.info().passive_fuel_efficiency );
1363  if( efficiency == 0.f ) {
1364  return;
1365  }
1366  return;
1367  } else {
1368  efficiency = get_effective_efficiency( bio, bio.info().fuel_efficiency );
1369  }
1370 
1371  if( bio.is_safe_fuel_on()
1372  && get_power_level() + 1_kJ * efficiency >= get_max_power_level() * std::min( 1.0f,
1373  bio.get_safe_fuel_thresh() ) ) {
1374  // Do not waste fuel charging over limit.
1375  // 1 kJ treshold to avoid draining full fuel on trickle charge
1376  // Individual power sources need their own check for this because power per charge can be large.
1377  return;
1378  }
1379 
1380  bionic_fuels result = bionic_fuel_check( bio, false );
1381 
1382  units::energy energy_gain = 0_kJ;
1383  map &here = get_map();
1384 
1385  // Each bionic *should* have only one power source.
1386  // Avoid draining multiple sources. So check for energy_gain = 0_kJ
1387 
1388  // Vehicle may not have power.
1389  // Return out if power was drained. Otherwise continue with other sources.
1390  if( !result.connected_vehicles.empty() ) {
1391  // Cable bionic charging from connected vehicle(s)
1392  for( vehicle *veh : result.connected_vehicles ) {
1393  int undrained = veh->discharge_battery( 1 );
1394  if( undrained == 0 ) {
1395  energy_gain = 1_kJ;
1396  break;
1397  }
1398  }
1399  }
1400 
1401  // Rest of the fuel sources are known to exist so we can exit after any of them is used
1402  if( energy_gain == 0_J && !result.connected_fuel.empty() ) {
1403  // Bionic that uses fuel items from some external connected source.
1404 
1405  for( item *fuel_source : result.connected_fuel ) {
1406  item *fuel;
1407  // Fuel may be ammo or in container
1408  if( fuel_source->ammo_remaining() ) {
1409  fuel = &fuel_source->first_ammo();
1410  } else {
1411  fuel = fuel_source->all_items_ptr( pocket_type::CONTAINER ).front();
1412  }
1413  energy_gain = fuel->fuel_energy();
1414 
1415  if( bio.is_safe_fuel_on() &&
1416  get_power_level() + energy_gain * efficiency >= get_max_power_level() * std::min( 1.0f,
1417  bio.get_safe_fuel_thresh() ) ) {
1418  // Do not waste fuel charging over limit.
1419  return;
1420  }
1421  if( fuel->count_by_charges() ) {
1422  fuel->charges--;
1423  if( fuel->charges == 0 ) {
1424  i_rem( fuel );
1425  }
1426  } else {
1427  i_rem( fuel );
1428  }
1429 
1430  }
1431  }
1432 
1433  // There *could* be multiple fuel sources. But we just check first for solar.
1434  bool solar_powered = ( !bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() &&
1435  bio.id->fuel_opts.front() == fuel_type_sun_light ) ||
1436  !result.connected_solar.empty();
1437  if( energy_gain == 0_J && solar_powered && !g->is_sheltered( pos() ) ) {
1438  // Some sort of solar source
1439 
1440  const weather_type_id &wtype = current_weather( get_location() );
1441  float intensity = incident_sun_irradiance( wtype, calendar::turn ); // W/m2
1442 
1443  if( !result.connected_solar.empty() ) {
1444  // Cable charger connected to solar panel item.
1445  // There *could* be multiple items. But we only take first.
1446  intensity *= result.connected_solar.front()->type->solar_efficiency;
1447  }
1448  energy_gain = units::from_joule( intensity );
1449  }
1450 
1451  // There *could* be multiple fuel sources. But we just check first for solar.
1452  bool metabolism_powered = !bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() &&
1453  bio.id->fuel_opts.front() == fuel_type_metabolism;
1454  if( energy_gain == 0_J && metabolism_powered ) {
1455  // Bionic powered by metabolism
1456  // 1kcal = 4184 J
1457  energy_gain = 4184_J;
1458 
1459  if( bio.is_safe_fuel_on() &&
1460  get_power_level() + energy_gain * efficiency >= get_max_power_level() * std::min( 1.0f,
1461  bio.get_safe_fuel_thresh() ) ) {
1462  // Do not waste fuel charging over limit.
1463  // Individual power sources need their own check for this because power per charge can be large.
1464  return;
1465  }
1466 
1467  mod_stored_kcal( -1, true );
1468  }
1469 
1470  // There *could* be multiple fuel sources. But we just check first for solar.
1471  bool wind_powered = !bio.id->fuel_opts.empty() && bio.id->fuel_opts.front() == fuel_type_wind;
1472  if( energy_gain == 0_J && wind_powered ) {
1473  // Wind power
1474  int vehwindspeed = 0;
1475 
1476  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos() );
1477  if( vp ) {
1478  vehwindspeed = std::abs( vp->vehicle().velocity / 100 );
1479  }
1480  weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
1481  const int windpower = get_local_windpower( weather.windspeed + vehwindspeed,
1482  overmap_buffer.ter( global_omt_location() ), get_location(), weather.winddirection,
1483  g->is_sheltered( pos() ) );
1484  energy_gain = 1_kJ * windpower;
1485  }
1486 
1487  mod_power_level( energy_gain * efficiency );
1488  heat_emission( bio, energy_gain );
1489  here.emit_field( pos(), bio.info().power_gen_emission );
1490 }
1491 
1492 void Character::heat_emission( const bionic &bio, units::energy fuel_energy )
1493 {
1494  if( !bio.info().exothermic_power_gen ) {
1495  return;
1496  }
1497  const float efficiency = bio.info().fuel_efficiency;
1498 
1499  const int heat_prod = units::to_kilojoule( fuel_energy * ( 1.0f - efficiency ) );
1500  const int heat_level = std::min( heat_prod / 10, 4 );
1501  const emit_id hotness = emit_id( "emit_hot_air" + std::to_string( heat_level ) + "_cbm" );
1502  map &here = get_map();
1503  if( hotness.is_valid() ) {
1504  const int heat_spread = std::max( heat_prod / 10 - heat_level, 1 );
1505  here.emit_field( pos(), hotness, heat_spread );
1506  }
1507  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, size_t> &bp : bio.info().occupied_bodyparts ) {
1508  add_effect( effect_heating_bionic, 2_seconds, bp.first.id(), false, heat_prod );
1509  }
1510 }
1511 
1512 float Character::get_effective_efficiency( const bionic &bio, float fuel_efficiency ) const
1513 {
1514  const std::optional<float> &coverage_penalty = bio.info().coverage_power_gen_penalty;
1515  float effective_efficiency = fuel_efficiency;
1516  if( coverage_penalty ) {
1517  int coverage = 0;
1518  const std::map< bodypart_str_id, size_t > &occupied_bodyparts = bio.info().occupied_bodyparts;
1519  for( const std::pair< const bodypart_str_id, size_t > &elem : occupied_bodyparts ) {
1520  coverage += worn.coverage_with_flags_exclude( elem.first.id(),
1521  { flag_ALLOWS_NATURAL_ATTACKS, flag_SEMITANGIBLE, flag_PERSONAL, flag_AURA } );
1522  }
1523  effective_efficiency = fuel_efficiency * ( 1.0 - ( coverage / ( 100.0 *
1524  occupied_bodyparts.size() ) )
1525  * coverage_penalty.value() );
1526  }
1527  return effective_efficiency;
1528 }
1529 
1530 /**
1531  * @param p the player
1532  * @param bio the bionic that is meant to be recharged.
1533  * @param amount the amount of power that is to be spent recharging the bionic.
1534  * @return indicates whether we successfully charged the bionic.
1535  */
1536 static bool attempt_recharge( Character &p, bionic &bio, units::energy &amount )
1537 {
1538  const bionic_data &info = bio.info();
1539  units::energy power_cost = info.power_over_time;
1540  bool recharged = false;
1541 
1542  if( power_cost > 0_kJ ) {
1543  if( info.has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "BIONIC_ARMOR_INTERFACE" ) ) ) ) {
1544  // Don't spend any power on armor interfacing unless we're wearing active powered armor.
1545  if( !p.worn.is_wearing_active_power_armor() ) {
1546  const units::energy armor_power_cost = 1_kJ;
1547  power_cost -= armor_power_cost;
1548  }
1549  }
1550  if( p.get_power_level() >= power_cost ) {
1551  // Set the recharging cost and charge the bionic.
1552  amount = power_cost;
1553  bio.charge_timer = info.charge_time;
1554  recharged = true;
1555  }
1556  }
1557 
1558  return recharged;
1559 }
1560 
1561 void Character::process_bionic( bionic &bio )
1562 {
1563 
1564  // Only powered bionics should be processed
1565  if( !bio.powered ) {
1566  burn_fuel( bio );
1567  return;
1568  }
1569 
1570  if( bio.get_uid() == get_weapon_bionic_uid() ) {
1571  const bool wrong_weapon_wielded = weapon.typeId() != bio.get_weapon().typeId() ||
1572  !weapon.has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD );
1573 
1574  if( wrong_weapon_wielded ) {
1575  // Wielded weapon replaced in an unexpected way
1576  debugmsg( "Wielded weapon doesn't match the expected weapon equipped from %s", bio.id->name );
1577  weapon_bionic_uid = 0;
1578  }
1579 
1580  if( weapon.is_null() || wrong_weapon_wielded ) {
1581  // Force deactivation because the weapon is gone
1582  force_bionic_deactivation( bio );
1583  return;
1584  }
1585  }
1586 
1587  // These might be affected by environmental conditions, status effects, faulty bionics, etc.
1588  time_duration discharge_rate = 1_turns;
1589 
1590  units::energy cost = 0_mJ;
1591 
1592  bio.charge_timer = std::max( 0_turns, bio.charge_timer - discharge_rate );
1593  if( bio.charge_timer <= 0_turns ) {
1594  if( bio.info().charge_time > 0_turns ) {
1595  if( bio.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_POWER_SOURCE ) ) {
1596  // Convert fuel to bionic power
1597  burn_fuel( bio );
1598  // Reset timer
1599  bio.charge_timer = bio.info().charge_time;
1600  } else {
1601  // Try to recharge our bionic if it is made for it
1602  bool recharged = attempt_recharge( *this, bio, cost );
1603  if( !recharged ) {
1604  // No power to recharge, so deactivate
1605  bio.powered = false;
1606  add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, _( "Your %s powers down." ), bio.info().name );
1607  // This purposely bypasses the deactivation cost
1608  deactivate_bionic( bio, true );
1609  return;
1610  }
1611  if( cost > 0_mJ ) {
1612  mod_power_level( -cost );
1613  }
1614  }
1615  }
1616  }
1617 
1618  for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : bio.id->processed_eocs ) {
1619  dialogue d( get_talker_for( *this ), nullptr );
1620  if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
1621  eoc->activate( d );
1622  } else {
1623  debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for a bionic process. If you don't want the effect_on_condition to happen on its own (without the bionic being activated), remove the recurrence min and max. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this bionic with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." );
1624  }
1625  }
1626 
1627  // Bionic effects on every turn they are active go here.
1628  if( bio.id == bio_remote ) {
1629  if( g->remoteveh() == nullptr && get_value( "remote_controlling" ).empty() ) {
1630  bio.powered = false;
1631  add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "Your %s has lost connection and is turning off." ),
1632  bio.info().name );
1633  }
1634  } else if( bio.id == bio_nanobots ) {
1635  std::forward_list<bodypart_id> bleeding_bp_parts;
1636  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1637  if( has_effect( effect_bleed, bp.id() ) ) {
1638  bleeding_bp_parts.push_front( bp );
1639  }
1640  }
1641  std::vector<bodypart_id> damaged_hp_parts;
1642  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &part : get_body() ) {
1643  const int hp_cur = part.second.get_hp_cur();
1644  if( hp_cur > 0 && hp_cur < part.second.get_hp_max() ) {
1645  damaged_hp_parts.push_back( part.first.id() );
1646  }
1647  }
1648  if( damaged_hp_parts.empty() && bleeding_bp_parts.empty() ) {
1649  // Nothing to heal. Return the consumed power and exit early
1650  mod_power_level( cost );
1651  return;
1652  }
1653  for( const bodypart_id &i : bleeding_bp_parts ) {
1654  // effectively reduces by 1 intensity level
1655  if( get_stored_kcal() >= 15 ) {
1656  get_effect( effect_bleed, i ).mod_duration( -get_effect( effect_bleed, i ).get_int_dur_factor() );
1657  mod_stored_kcal( -15 );
1658  } else {
1659  bleeding_bp_parts.clear();
1660  break;
1661  }
1662  }
1663  if( calendar::once_every( 60_turns ) ) {
1664  if( get_stored_kcal() >= 5 && !damaged_hp_parts.empty() ) {
1665  const bodypart_id part_to_heal = damaged_hp_parts[ rng( 0, damaged_hp_parts.size() - 1 ) ];
1666  heal( part_to_heal, 1 );
1667  mod_stored_kcal( -5 );
1668  }
1669  }
1670  } else if( bio.id == bio_painkiller ) {
1671  const int pkill = get_painkiller();
1672  const int pain = get_pain();
1673  const units::energy trigger_cost = bio.info().power_trigger;
1674  int max_pkill = std::min( 150, pain );
1675  if( pkill < max_pkill ) {
1676  mod_painkiller( 1 );
1677  mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
1678  }
1679 
1680  // Only dull pain so extreme that we can't pkill it safely
1681  if( pkill >= 150 && pain > pkill && get_stim() > -150 ) {
1682  mod_pain( -1 );
1683  // Negative side effect: negative stim
1684  mod_stim( -1 );
1685  mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
1686  }
1687  } else if( bio.id == bio_gills ) {
1688  if( has_effect( effect_asthma ) ) {
1689  add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1690  _( "You feel your throat open up and air filling your lungs!" ) );
1691  remove_effect( effect_asthma );
1692  }
1693  } else if( bio.id == bio_evap ) {
1694  if( is_underwater() ) {
1695  add_msg_if_player( m_info,
1696  _( "Your %s deactivates after it finds itself completely submerged in water." ), bio.info().name );
1697  deactivate_bionic( bio );
1698  }
1699 
1700  // Aero-Evaporator provides water at 60 watts with 2 L / kWh efficiency
1701  // which is 10 mL per 5 minutes. Humidity can modify the amount gained.
1702  if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1703  const w_point weatherPoint = *get_weather().weather_precise;
1704  int humidity = get_local_humidity( weatherPoint.humidity, get_weather().weather_id,
1705  g->is_sheltered( pos() ) );
1706  // in thirst units = 5 mL water
1707  int water_available = std::lround( humidity * 3.0 / 100.0 );
1708  // At 50% relative humidity or more, the player will draw 10 mL
1709  // At 16% relative humidity or less, the bionic will give up
1710  if( water_available == 0 ) {
1711  add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
1712  _( "There is not enough humidity in the air for your %s to function." ),
1713  bio.info().name );
1714  deactivate_bionic( bio );
1715  } else if( water_available == 1 ) {
1716  add_msg_if_player( m_mixed,
1717  _( "Your %s issues a low humidity warning. Efficiency is reduced." ),
1718  bio.info().name );
1719  }
1720 
1721  mod_thirst( -water_available );
1722  }
1723 
1724  if( get_thirst() < -40 ) {
1725  add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1726  _( "You are properly hydrated. Your %s chirps happily." ),
1727  bio.info().name );
1728  deactivate_bionic( bio );
1729  }
1730  } else if( bio.id == afs_bio_dopamine_stimulators ) {
1731  // Aftershock
1732  add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 20, 20, 30_minutes, 20_minutes, true );
1733  }
1734 }
1735 
1736 void Character::roll_critical_bionics_failure( const bodypart_id &bp )
1737 {
1738  const bodypart_id bp_to_hurt = bp->main_part;
1739  if( one_in( get_part_hp_cur( bp_to_hurt ) / 4 ) ) {
1740  set_part_hp_cur( bp_to_hurt, 0 );
1741  }
1742 }
1743 
1744 void Character::bionics_uninstall_failure( int difficulty, int success, float adjusted_skill )
1745 {
1746  // "success" should be passed in as a negative integer representing how far off we
1747  // were for a successful removal. We use this to determine consequences for failing.
1748  success = std::abs( success );
1749 
1750  // failure level is decided by how far off the character was from a successful removal, and
1751  // this is scaled up or down by the ratio of difficulty/skill. At high skill levels (or low
1752  // difficulties), only minor consequences occur. At low skill levels, severe consequences
1753  // are more likely.
1754  const int failure_level = static_cast<int>( std::sqrt( success * 4.0 * difficulty /
1755  adjusted_skill ) );
1756  const int fail_type = std::min( 5, failure_level );
1757 
1758  if( fail_type <= 0 ) {
1759  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The removal fails without incident." ) );
1760  return;
1761  }
1762 
1763  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The removal is a failure." ) );
1764  std::set<bodypart_id> bp_hurt;
1765  switch( fail_type ) {
1766  case 1:
1767  if( !has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
1768  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It really hurts!" ) );
1769  mod_pain( rng( 10, 30 ) );
1770  }
1771  break;
1772 
1773  case 2:
1774  case 3:
1775  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1776  if( has_effect( effect_under_operation, bp.id() ) ) {
1777  if( bp_hurt.count( bp->main_part ) > 0 ) {
1778  continue;
1779  }
1780  bp_hurt.emplace( bp->main_part );
1781  apply_damage( this, bp, rng( 5, 10 ), true );
1782  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is damaged." ), _( "<npcname>'s %s is damaged." ),
1783  body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1784  }
1785  }
1786  break;
1787 
1788  case 4:
1789  case 5:
1790  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1791  if( has_effect( effect_under_operation, bp.id() ) ) {
1792  if( bp_hurt.count( bp->main_part ) > 0 ) {
1793  continue;
1794  }
1795  bp_hurt.emplace( bp->main_part );
1796 
1797  apply_damage( this, bp, rng( 25, 50 ), true );
1798  roll_critical_bionics_failure( bp );
1799 
1800  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is severely damaged." ),
1801  _( "<npcname>'s %s is severely damaged." ),
1802  body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1803  }
1804  }
1805  break;
1806  }
1807 
1808 }
1809 
1810 void Character::bionics_uninstall_failure( monster &installer, Character &patient, int difficulty,
1811  int success, float adjusted_skill )
1812 {
1813 
1814  // "success" should be passed in as a negative integer representing how far off we
1815  // were for a successful removal. We use this to determine consequences for failing.
1816  success = std::abs( success );
1817 
1818  // failure level is decided by how far off the monster was from a successful removal, and
1819  // this is scaled up or down by the ratio of difficulty/skill. At high skill levels (or low
1820  // difficulties), only minor consequences occur. At low skill levels, severe consequences
1821  // are more likely.
1822  const int failure_level = static_cast<int>( std::sqrt( success * 4.0 * difficulty /
1823  adjusted_skill ) );
1824  const int fail_type = std::min( 5, failure_level );
1825 
1826  bool u_see = sees( patient );
1827 
1828  if( u_see || patient.is_avatar() ) {
1829  if( fail_type <= 0 ) {
1830  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The removal fails without incident." ) );
1831  return;
1832  }
1833  switch( rng( 1, 5 ) ) {
1834  case 1:
1835  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "The %s flub the operation." ), installer.name() );
1836  break;
1837  case 2:
1838  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "The %s messes up the operation." ), installer.name() );
1839  break;
1840  case 3:
1841  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "The operation fails." ) );
1842  break;
1843  case 4:
1844  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "The operation is a failure." ) );
1845  break;
1846  case 5:
1847  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "The %s screws up the operation." ), installer.name() );
1848  break;
1849  }
1850  }
1851  std::set<bodypart_id> bp_hurt;
1852  switch( fail_type ) {
1853  case 1:
1854  if( !has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
1855  patient.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It really hurts!" ) );
1856  patient.mod_pain( rng( 10, 30 ) );
1857  }
1858  break;
1859 
1860  case 2:
1861  case 3:
1862  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1863  if( has_effect( effect_under_operation, bp.id() ) ) {
1864  if( bp_hurt.count( bp->main_part ) > 0 ) {
1865  continue;
1866  }
1867  bp_hurt.emplace( bp->main_part );
1868  patient.apply_damage( this, bp, rng( failure_level, failure_level * 2 ), true );
1869  if( u_see ) {
1870  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is damaged." ), _( "<npcname>'s %s is damaged." ),
1871  body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1872  }
1873  }
1874  }
1875  break;
1876 
1877  case 4:
1878  case 5:
1879  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
1880  if( has_effect( effect_under_operation, bp.id() ) ) {
1881  if( bp_hurt.count( bp->main_part ) > 0 ) {
1882  continue;
1883  }
1884  bp_hurt.emplace( bp->main_part );
1885 
1886  patient.apply_damage( this, bp, rng( 25, 50 ), true );
1887  roll_critical_bionics_failure( bp );
1888 
1889  if( u_see ) {
1890  patient.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is severely damaged." ),
1891  _( "<npcname>'s %s is severely damaged." ),
1892  body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
1893  }
1894  }
1895  }
1896  break;
1897  }
1898 }

1900 bool Character::has_enough_anesth( const itype &cbm, Character &patient ) const
1901 {
1902  if( !cbm.bionic ) {
1903  debugmsg( "has_enough_anesth( const itype *cbm ): %s is not a bionic", cbm.get_id().str() );
1904  return false;
1905  }
1906 
1907  if( patient.has_bionic( bio_painkiller ) || patient.has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ||
1908  patient.has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
1909  return true;
1910  }
1911 
1912  const int weight = units::to_kilogram( patient.bodyweight() ) / 10;
1913  const requirement_data req_anesth = *requirement_data_anesthetic *
1914  cbm.bionic->difficulty * 2 * weight;
1915 
1916  return req_anesth.can_make_with_inventory( crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component );
1917 }

1919 bool Character::has_enough_anesth( const itype &cbm ) const

1922  has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) || has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ) {
1923  return true;

1927  cbm.bionic->difficulty * 2 * weight;

1931  buffer += "\n";

1948  consume_tools( e );
1949  }

1951 }

1982 // bionic manipulation adjusted skill
1983 float Character::bionics_adjusted_skill( bool autodoc, int skill_level ) const
1984 {
1985  int pl_skill = bionics_pl_skill( autodoc, skill_level );
1986 
1987  // for chance_of_success calculation, shift skill down to a float between ~0.4 - 30
1988  float adjusted_skill = static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - std::min( static_cast<float>( 40 ),
1989  static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) / static_cast<float>( 10.0 ) );
1990  adjusted_skill += get_effect_int( effect_assisted );
1991  adjusted_skill *= env_surgery_bonus( 1 );
1992  return adjusted_skill;
1993 }
1994 
1995 int Character::bionics_pl_skill( bool autodoc, int skill_level ) const
1996 {
1997  skill_id most_important_skill;
1998  skill_id important_skill;
1999  skill_id least_important_skill;
2000 
2001  if( autodoc ) {
2002  most_important_skill = skill_firstaid;
2003  important_skill = skill_computer;
2004  least_important_skill = skill_electronics;
2005  } else {
2006  most_important_skill = skill_electronics;
2007  important_skill = skill_firstaid;
2008  least_important_skill = skill_mechanics;
2009  }
2010 
2011  float pl_skill;
2012  if( skill_level == -1 ) {
2013  pl_skill = int_cur * 4 +
2014  get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( most_important_skill ) * 4 +
2015  get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( important_skill ) * 3 +
2016  get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( least_important_skill ) * 1;
2017  } else {
2018  // override chance as though all values were skill_level if it is provided
2019  pl_skill = 12 * skill_level;
2020  }
2021 
2022  // Medical residents have some idea what they're doing
2023  if( has_trait( trait_PROF_MED ) ) {
2024  pl_skill += 3;
2025  }
2026 
2027  // People trained in bionics gain an additional advantage towards using it
2028  if( has_trait( trait_PROF_AUTODOC ) ) {
2029  pl_skill += 7;
2030  }
2031  return round( pl_skill );
2032 }
2033 
2034 int bionic_success_chance( bool autodoc, int skill_level, int difficulty, const Character &target )
2035 {
2036  return bionic_manip_cos( target.bionics_adjusted_skill( autodoc, skill_level ), difficulty );
2037 }
2038 
2039 // bionic manipulation chance of success
2040 int bionic_manip_cos( float adjusted_skill, int bionic_difficulty )
2041 {
2042  if( get_player_character().has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ||
2043  get_player_character().has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
2044  return 100;
2045  }
2046 
2047  int chance_of_success = 0;
2048  // we will base chance_of_success on a ratio of skill and difficulty
2049  // when skill=difficulty, this gives us 1. skill < difficulty gives a fraction.
2050  float skill_difficulty_parameter = static_cast<float>( adjusted_skill /
2051  ( 4.0 * bionic_difficulty ) );
2052 
2053  // when skill == difficulty, chance_of_success is 50%. Chance of success drops quickly below that
2054  // to reserve bionics for characters with the appropriate skill. For more difficult bionics, the
2055  // curve flattens out just above 80%
2056  chance_of_success = static_cast<int>( ( 100 * skill_difficulty_parameter ) /
2057  ( skill_difficulty_parameter + std::sqrt( 1 / skill_difficulty_parameter ) ) );
2058 
2059  return chance_of_success;
2060 }
2061 
2062 bool Character::can_uninstall_bionic( const bionic &bio, Character &installer, bool autodoc,
2063  int skill_level ) const
2064 {
2065 
2066  // if malfunctioning bionics doesn't have associated item it gets a difficulty of 12
2067  int difficulty = 12;
2068  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.id->itype() ) ) {
2069  const itype *type = item::find_type( bio.id->itype() );
2070  if( type->bionic ) {
2071  difficulty = type->bionic->difficulty;
2072  }
2073  }
2074 
2075  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2076 
2077  if( bio.is_included() ) {
2078  popup( _( "%s must remove the parent bionic to remove the %s." ), installer.disp_name(),
2079  bio.id->name );
2080  return false;
2081  }
2082 
2083  for( const bionic_id &bid : get_bionics() ) {
2084  if( bid->required_bionic && bid->required_bionic == bio.id ) {
2085  popup( _( "%s cannot be removed because installed bionic %s requires it." ), bio.id->name,
2086  bid->name );
2087  return false;
2088  }
2089  }
2090 
2091  if( bio.id->cant_remove_reason.has_value() ) {
2092  popup( string_format( bio.id->cant_remove_reason.value(), disp_name( true ), disp_name() ) );
2093  return false;
2094  }
2095 
2096  // removal of bionics adds +2 difficulty over installation
2097  int chance_of_success = bionic_success_chance( autodoc, skill_level, difficulty + 2,
2098  installer );
2099 
2100  if( chance_of_success >= 100 ) {
2101  if( !player_character.query_yn(
2102  _( "Are you sure you wish to uninstall the selected bionic?" ),
2103  100 - chance_of_success ) ) {
2104  return false;
2105  }
2106  } else {
2107  if( !player_character.query_yn(
2108  _( "WARNING: %i percent chance of SEVERE damage to all body parts! Continue anyway?" ),
2109  ( 100 - static_cast<int>( chance_of_success ) ) ) ) {
2110  return false;
2111  }
2112  }
2113 
2114  return true;
2115 }
2116 
2117 bool Character::uninstall_bionic( const bionic &bio, Character &installer, bool autodoc,
2118  int skill_level )
2119 {
2120  // if malfunctioning bionics doesn't have associated item it gets a difficulty of 12
2121  int difficulty = 12;
2122  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.id->itype() ) ) {
2123  const itype *type = item::find_type( bio.id->itype() );
2124  if( type->bionic ) {
2125  difficulty = type->bionic->difficulty;
2126  }
2127  }
2128 
2129  // removal of bionics adds +2 difficulty over installation
2130  int pl_skill = bionics_pl_skill( autodoc, skill_level );
2131  int chance_of_success = bionic_success_chance( autodoc, skill_level, difficulty + 2, installer );
2132 
2133  // Surgery is imminent, retract claws or blade if active
2134  for( bionic &it : *installer.my_bionics ) {
2135  if( it.powered && it.info().has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_WEAPON ) ) {
2136  installer.deactivate_bionic( it );
2137  }
2138  }
2139 
2140  int success = chance_of_success - rng( 1, 100 );
2141  if( installer.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ||
2142  installer.has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
2143  perform_uninstall( bio, difficulty, success, pl_skill );
2144  return true;
2145  }
2146  assign_activity( ACT_OPERATION, to_moves<int>( difficulty * 20_minutes ) );
2147 
2148  activity.values.push_back( difficulty );
2149  activity.values.push_back( success );
2150  activity.values.push_back( bio.get_uid() );
2151  activity.values.push_back( pl_skill );
2152  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "uninstall" );
2153  activity.str_values.push_back( bio.id.str() );
2154  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "" ); // installer_name is unused for uninstall
2155  if( autodoc ) {
2156  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "true" );
2157  } else {
2158  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "false" );
2159  }
2160  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, size_t> &elem : bio.id->occupied_bodyparts ) {
2161  add_effect( effect_under_operation, difficulty * 20_minutes, elem.first.id(), true, difficulty );
2162  }
2163 
2164  return true;
2165 }

2167 void Character::perform_uninstall( const bionic &bio, int difficulty, int success, int pl_skill )
2168 {
2169  map &here = get_map();
2170  std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( bio.get_uid() );
2171  if( !bio_opt ) {
2172  debugmsg( "Tried to uninstall non-existent bionic with UID %d", bio.get_uid() );
2173  return;
2174  }
2175 
2176  if( success > 0 ) {
2177  get_event_bus().send<event_type::removes_cbm>( getID(), bio.id );
2178 
2179  // until bionics can be flagged as non-removable
2180  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_neutral, _( "Your parts are jiggled back into their familiar places." ),
2181  _( "<npcname>'s parts are jiggled back into their familiar places." ) );
2182  add_msg( m_good, _( "Successfully removed %s." ), bio.id.obj().name );
2183  const bionic_id bio_id = bio.id;
2184  remove_bionic( bio );
2185 
2186  // give us any muts it's supposed to (silently) if removed
2187  for( const trait_id &mid : bio_id->give_mut_on_removal ) {
2188  if( !has_trait( mid ) ) {
2189  set_mutation( mid );
2190  }
2191  }
2192 
2193  item cbm( "burnt_out_bionic" );
2194  if( item::type_is_defined( bio_id->itype() ) ) {
2195  cbm = item( bio_id.c_str() );
2196  }
2197  cbm.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
2198  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
2199  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
2200  cbm.faults.emplace( fault_bionic_salvaged );
2201  here.add_item( pos(), cbm );
2202  } else {
2203  get_event_bus().send<event_type::fails_to_remove_cbm>( getID(), bio.id );
2204  // for chance_of_success calculation, shift skill down to a float between ~0.4 - 30
2205  float adjusted_skill = static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - std::min( static_cast<float>( 40 ),
2206  static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) / static_cast<float>
2207  ( 10.0 ) );
2208  bionics_uninstall_failure( difficulty, success, adjusted_skill );
2209 
2210  }
2211  here.invalidate_map_cache( here.get_abs_sub().z() );
2212 }

2214 bool Character::uninstall_bionic( const bionic &bio, monster &installer, Character &patient,
2215  float adjusted_skill )
2216 {
2217  viewer &player_view = get_player_view();
2218  if( installer.ammo[itype_anesthetic] <= 0 ) {
2219  add_msg_if_player_sees( installer, _( "The %s's anesthesia kit looks empty." ), installer.name() );
2220  return false;
2221  }
2222 
2223  item bionic_to_uninstall = item( bio.id.str(), calendar::turn_zero );
2224  const itype *itemtype = bionic_to_uninstall.type;
2225  int difficulty = itemtype->bionic->difficulty;
2226  int chance_of_success = bionic_manip_cos( adjusted_skill, difficulty + 2 );
2227  int success = chance_of_success - rng( 1, 100 );
2228 
2229  const time_duration duration = difficulty * 20_minutes;
2230  // don't stack up the effect
2231  if( !installer.has_effect( effect_operating ) ) {
2232  installer.add_effect( effect_operating, duration + 5_turns );
2233  }
2234 
2235  if( patient.is_avatar() ) {
2236  add_msg( m_bad,
2237  _( "You feel a tiny pricking sensation in your right arm, and lose all sensation before abruptly blacking out." ) );
2238  } else {
2239  add_msg_if_player_sees( installer, m_bad,
2240  _( "The %1$s gently inserts a syringe into %2$s's arm and starts injecting something while holding them down." ),
2241  installer.name(), patient.disp_name() );
2242  }
2243 
2244  installer.ammo[itype_anesthetic] -= 1;
2245 
2246  patient.add_effect( effect_narcosis, duration );
2247  patient.add_effect( effect_sleep, duration );
2248 
2249  if( patient.is_avatar() ) {
2250  add_msg( _( "You fall asleep and %1$s starts operating." ), installer.disp_name() );
2251  } else {
2252  add_msg_if_player_sees( patient, _( "%1$s falls asleep and %2$s starts operating." ),
2253  patient.disp_name(), installer.disp_name() );
2254  }
2255 
2256  if( success > 0 ) {
2257 
2258  if( patient.is_avatar() ) {
2259  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "Your parts are jiggled back into their familiar places." ) );
2260  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "Successfully removed %s." ), bio.info().name );
2261  } else if( patient.is_npc() && player_view.sees( patient ) ) {
2262  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "%s's parts are jiggled back into their familiar places." ),
2263  patient.disp_name() );
2264  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "Successfully removed %s." ), bio.info().name );
2265  }
2266 
2267  item cbm( "burnt_out_bionic" );
2268  if( item::type_is_defined( bio.info().itype() ) ) {
2269  cbm = bionic_to_uninstall;
2270  }
2271  patient.remove_bionic( bio );
2272  cbm.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
2273  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
2274  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
2275  cbm.faults.emplace( fault_bionic_salvaged );
2276  get_map().add_item( patient.pos(), cbm );
2277  } else {
2278  bionics_uninstall_failure( installer, patient, difficulty, success, adjusted_skill );
2279  }
2280 
2281  return false;
2282 }

2284 ret_val<void> Character::is_installable( const item *it, const bool by_autodoc ) const
2285 {
2286  const itype *itemtype = it->type;
2287  const bionic_id &bid = itemtype->bionic->id;
2288 
2289  const auto has_trait_lambda = [this]( const trait_id & candidate ) {
2290  return has_trait( candidate );
2291  };
2292 
2293  if( it->has_flag( flag_FILTHY ) ) {
2294  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): single space after the period for symmetry
2295  const std::string msg = by_autodoc ? _( "/!\\ CBM is highly contaminated. /!\\" ) :
2296  _( "CBM is filthy." );
2297  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( msg );
2298  } else if( it->has_flag( flag_NO_STERILE ) ) {
2299  const std::string msg = by_autodoc ?
2300  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-text-style): single space after the period for symmetry
2301  _( "/!\\ CBM is not sterile. /!\\ Please use autoclave to sterilize." ) :
2302  _( "CBM is not sterile." );
2303  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( msg );
2304  } else if( it->has_fault( fault_bionic_salvaged ) ) {
2305  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM already deployed. Please reset to factory state." ) );
2306  } else if( has_bionic( bid ) && !bid->dupes_allowed ) {
2307  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM is already installed." ) );
2308  } else if( !can_install_cbm_on_bp( get_occupied_bodyparts( bid ) ) ) {
2309  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM not compatible with patient's body." ) );
2310  } else if( std::any_of( bid->mutation_conflicts.begin(), bid->mutation_conflicts.end(),
2311  has_trait_lambda ) ) {
2312  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM not compatible with patient's body." ) );
2313  } else if( bid->upgraded_bionic &&
2314  !has_bionic( bid->upgraded_bionic ) &&
2315  it->is_upgrade() ) {
2316  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "No base version installed." ) );
2317  } else if( bid->required_bionic &&
2318  !has_bionic( bid->required_bionic ) ) {
2319  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM requires prior installation of %s." ),
2320  bid->required_bionic.obj().name );
2321  } else if( std::any_of( bid->available_upgrades.begin(),
2322  bid->available_upgrades.end(),
2323  [this]( const bionic_id & b ) {
2324  return has_bionic( b );
2325  } ) ) {
2326  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "Superior version installed." ) );
2327  } else if( is_npc() && !bid->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_NPC_USABLE ) ) {
2328  return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "CBM not compatible with patient." ) );
2329  }
2330 
2331  return ret_val<void>::make_success( std::string() );
2332 }
