2334 bool Character::can_install_bionics( const itype &type, Character &installer, bool autodoc,
2335  int skill_level ) const
2336 {
2337  if( !type.bionic ) {
2338  debugmsg( "Tried to install NULL bionic" );
2339  return false;
2340  }
2341  if( has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) || has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
2342  return true;
2343  }
2344  if( is_mounted() ) {
2345  return false;
2346  }
2347 
2348  const bionic_id &bioid = type.bionic->id;
2349  const int difficult = type.bionic->difficulty;
2350 
2351  // if we're doing self install
2352  if( !autodoc && installer.is_avatar() ) {
2353  return installer.has_enough_anesth( type ) &&
2354  installer.has_installation_requirement( bioid );
2355  }
2356 
2357  int chance_of_success = bionic_success_chance( autodoc, skill_level, difficult, installer );
2358 
2359  std::vector<std::string> conflicting_muts;
2360  for( const trait_id &mid : bioid->canceled_mutations ) {
2361  if( has_trait( mid ) ) {
2362  conflicting_muts.push_back( mutation_name( mid ) );
2363  }
2364  }
2365 
2366  if( !conflicting_muts.empty() &&
2367  !query_yn(
2368  _( "Installing this bionic will remove the conflicting traits: %s. Continue anyway?" ),
2369  enumerate_as_string( conflicting_muts ) ) ) {
2370  return false;
2371  }
2372 
2373  const std::map<bodypart_id, int> &issues = bionic_installation_issues( bioid );
2374  // show all requirements which are not satisfied
2375  if( !issues.empty() ) {
2376  std::string detailed_info;
2377  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_id, int> &elem : issues ) {
2378  //~ <Body part name>: <number of slots> more slot(s) needed.
2379  detailed_info += string_format( _( "\n%s: %i more slot(s) needed." ),
2380  body_part_name_as_heading( elem.first, 1 ),
2381  elem.second );
2382  }
2383  popup( _( "Not enough space for bionic installation!%s" ), detailed_info );
2384  return false;
2385  }
2386 
2387  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2388  if( chance_of_success >= 100 ) {
2389  if( !player_character.query_yn(
2390  _( "Are you sure you wish to install the selected bionic?" ),
2391  100 - chance_of_success ) ) {
2392  return false;
2393  }
2394  } else {
2395  if( !player_character.query_yn(
2396  _( "WARNING: %i percent chance of failure that may result in damage, pain, or a faulty installation! Continue anyway?" ),
2397  ( 100 - chance_of_success ) ) ) {
2398  return false;
2399  }
2400  }
2401 
2402  return true;
2403 }

2405 float Character::env_surgery_bonus( int radius ) const
2406 {
2407  float bonus = 1.0f;
2408  map &here = get_map();
2409  for( const tripoint &cell : here.points_in_radius( pos(), radius ) ) {
2410  if( here.furn( cell )->surgery_skill_multiplier ) {
2411  bonus = std::max( bonus, *here.furn( cell )->surgery_skill_multiplier );
2412  }
2413  }
2414  return bonus;
2415 }

2417 bool Character::install_bionics( const itype &type, Character &installer, bool autodoc,
2418  int skill_level )
2419 {
2420  if( !type.bionic ) {
2421  debugmsg( "Tried to install NULL bionic" );
2422  return false;
2423  }
2424 
2425  const bionic_id &bioid = type.bionic->id;
2426  const bionic_id &upbioid = bioid->upgraded_bionic;
2427  const int difficulty = type.bionic->difficulty;
2428  int pl_skill = installer.bionics_pl_skill( autodoc, skill_level );
2429  int chance_of_success = bionic_success_chance( autodoc, skill_level, difficulty, installer );
2430 
2431  // Practice skills only if conducting manual installation
2432  if( !autodoc ) {
2433  installer.practice( skill_electronics, static_cast<int>( ( 100 - chance_of_success ) * 1.5 ) );
2434  installer.practice( skill_firstaid, static_cast<int>( ( 100 - chance_of_success ) * 1.0 ) );
2435  installer.practice( skill_mechanics, static_cast<int>( ( 100 - chance_of_success ) * 0.5 ) );
2436  }
2437 
2438  bionic_uid upbio_uid = 0;
2439  // TODO: Let the player pick a bionic to upgrade (if dupes exist)
2440  if( std::optional<bionic *> upbio = find_bionic_by_type( upbioid ) ) {
2441  upbio_uid = ( *upbio )->get_uid();
2442  }
2443 
2444  int success = chance_of_success - rng( 0, 99 );
2445  if( installer.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_BIONICS ) ||
2446  installer.has_flag( json_flag_MANUAL_CBM_INSTALLATION ) ) {
2447  perform_install( bioid, upbio_uid, difficulty, success, pl_skill, "NOT_MED",
2448  bioid->canceled_mutations, pos() );
2449  return true;
2450  }
2451  assign_activity( ACT_OPERATION, to_moves<int>( difficulty * 20_minutes ) );
2452  activity.values.push_back( difficulty );
2453  activity.values.push_back( success );
2454  activity.values.push_back( upbio_uid );
2455  activity.values.push_back( pl_skill );
2456  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "install" );
2457  activity.str_values.push_back( bioid.str() );
2458 
2459  if( installer.has_trait( trait_PROF_MED ) || installer.has_trait( trait_PROF_AUTODOC ) ) {
2460  activity.str_values.push_back( installer.disp_name( true ) );
2461  } else {
2462  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "NOT_MED" );
2463  }
2464  if( autodoc ) {
2465  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "true" );
2466  } else {
2467  activity.str_values.emplace_back( "false" );
2468  }
2469  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, size_t> &elem : bioid->occupied_bodyparts ) {
2470  add_effect( effect_under_operation, difficulty * 20_minutes, elem.first.id(), true, difficulty );
2471  }
2472 
2473  return true;
2474 }
2475 
2476 void Character::perform_install( const bionic_id &bid, bionic_uid upbio_uid, int difficulty,
2477  int success, int pl_skill, const std::string &installer_name,
2478  const std::vector<trait_id> &trait_to_rem, const tripoint &patient_pos )
2479 {
2480  // if we chop off a limb, our stored kcal should decrease proportionally
2481  float cached_healthy_kcal = get_healthy_kcal();
2482 
2483  if( success > 0 ) {
2484  get_event_bus().send<event_type::installs_cbm>( getID(), bid );
2485  if( upbio_uid ) {
2486  if( std::optional<bionic *> upbio = find_bionic_by_uid( upbio_uid ) ) {
2487  const std::string bio_name = ( *upbio )->id->name.translated();
2488  remove_bionic( **upbio );
2489  //~ %1$s - name of the bionic to be upgraded (inferior), %2$s - name of the upgraded bionic (superior).
2490  add_msg( m_good, _( "Successfully upgraded %1$s to %2$s." ), bio_name, bid.obj().name );
2491  } else {
2492  debugmsg( "Couldn't find bionic with UID %d to upgrade", upbio_uid );
2493  }
2494  } else {
2495  //~ %s - name of the bionic.
2496  add_msg( m_good, _( "Successfully installed %s." ), bid.obj().name );
2497  }
2498 
2499  add_bionic( bid );
2500 
2501  for( const trait_id &tid : trait_to_rem ) {
2502  if( has_trait( tid ) ) {
2503  remove_mutation( tid );
2504  }
2505  }
2506  // now that bionic has been added, compare our new healthy kcal to our old healthy kcal and multiply stored kcal by the ratio
2507  set_stored_kcal( get_stored_kcal() * ( static_cast<float>( get_healthy_kcal() ) /
2508  cached_healthy_kcal ) );
2509 
2510  } else {
2511  get_event_bus().send<event_type::fails_to_install_cbm>( getID(), bid );
2512 
2513  // for chance_of_success calculation, shift skill down to a float between ~0.4 - 30
2514  float adjusted_skill = static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - std::min( static_cast<float>( 40 ),
2515  static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) - static_cast<float>( pl_skill ) / static_cast<float>
2516  ( 10.0 ) );
2517  bionics_install_failure( bid, installer_name, difficulty, success, adjusted_skill, patient_pos );
2518  }
2519  map &here = get_map();
2520  here.invalidate_map_cache( here.get_abs_sub().z() );
2521 }
2522 
2523 void Character::bionics_install_failure( const bionic_id &bid, const std::string &installer,
2524  int difficulty, int success, float adjusted_skill, const tripoint &patient_pos )
2525 {
2526  // "success" should be passed in as a negative integer representing how far off we
2527  // were for a successful install. We use this to determine consequences for failing.
2528  success = std::abs( success );
2529 
2530  // failure level is decided by how far off the character was from a successful install, and
2531  // this is scaled up or down by the ratio of difficulty/skill. At high skill levels (or low
2532  // difficulties), only minor consequences occur. At low skill levels, severe consequences
2533  // are more likely.
2534  int failure_level = static_cast<int>( std::sqrt( success * 4.0 * difficulty / adjusted_skill ) );
2535  int fail_type = failure_level > 5 ? 5 : failure_level;
2536  bool drop_cbm = false;
2537  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The installation is a failure." ) );
2538 
2539  if( installer != "NOT_MED" ) {
2540  //~"Complications" is USian medical-speak for "unintended damage from a medical procedure".
2541  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "%s training helps to minimize the complications." ),
2542  installer );
2543  // In addition to the bonus, medical residents know enough OR protocol to avoid botching.
2544  // Take MD and be immune to faulty bionics.
2545  if( fail_type > 3 ) {
2546  fail_type = rng( 1, 3 );
2547  }
2548  }
2549  if( fail_type <= 0 ) {
2550  add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The installation fails without incident." ) );
2551  drop_cbm = true;
2552  } else {
2553  std::set<bodypart_id> bp_hurt;
2554  switch( fail_type ) {
2555 
2556  case 1:
2557  if( !has_flag( json_flag_PAIN_IMMUNE ) ) {
2558  add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It really hurts!" ) );
2559  mod_pain( rng( 10, 30 ) );
2560  }
2561  drop_cbm = true;
2562  break;
2563 
2564  case 2:
2565  case 3: {
2566  add_msg( m_bad, _( "The installation is faulty!" ) );
2567  std::vector<bionic_id> valid;
2568  std::copy_if( begin( faulty_bionics ), end( faulty_bionics ), std::back_inserter( valid ),
2569  [&]( const bionic_id & id ) {
2570  return !has_bionic( id ) && !id->dupes_allowed;
2571  } );
2572 
2573  if( valid.empty() ) {
2574  // No unique faulty bionics left. Pick one that allows dupes
2575  std::copy_if( begin( faulty_bionics ), end( faulty_bionics ), std::back_inserter( valid ),
2576  [&]( const bionic_id & id ) {
2577  return id->dupes_allowed;
2578  } );
2579  }
2580 
2581  if( valid.empty() ) {
2582  // Shouldn't happen unless no faulty bionic has allow_dupes=true
2583  debugmsg( "Couldn't find any faulty bionics to install!" );
2584  } else {
2585  const bionic_id &id = random_entry( valid );
2586  add_bionic( id );
2587  get_event_bus().send<event_type::installs_faulty_cbm>( getID(), id );
2588  }
2589 
2590  break;
2591  }
2592  case 4:
2593  case 5: {
2594  for( const bodypart_id &bp : get_all_body_parts() ) {
2595  if( has_effect( effect_under_operation, bp.id() ) ) {
2596  if( bp_hurt.count( bp->main_part ) > 0 ) {
2597  continue;
2598  }
2599  bp_hurt.emplace( bp->main_part );
2600 
2601  apply_damage( this, bp, rng( 25, 50 ), true );
2602  roll_critical_bionics_failure( bp );
2603 
2604  add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is damaged." ), _( "<npcname>'s %s is damaged." ),
2605  body_part_name_accusative( bp ) );
2606  }
2607  }
2608  drop_cbm = true;
2609  break;
2610  }
2611  }
2612  }
2613  if( drop_cbm ) {
2614  item cbm( bid.c_str() );
2615  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_STERILE );
2616  cbm.set_flag( flag_NO_PACKED );
2617  cbm.faults.emplace( fault_bionic_salvaged );
2618  get_map().add_item( patient_pos, cbm );
2619  }
2620 }
2621 
2622 std::string list_occupied_bps( const bionic_id &bio_id, const std::string &intro,
2623  const bool each_bp_on_new_line )
2624 {
2625  if( bio_id->occupied_bodyparts.empty() ) {
2626  return "";
2627  }
2628  std::string desc = intro;
2629  for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, size_t> &elem : bio_id->occupied_bodyparts ) {
2630  desc += ( each_bp_on_new_line ? "\n" : " " );
2631  //~ <Bodypart name> (<number of occupied slots> slots);
2632  desc += string_format( _( "%s (%i slots);" ),
2633  body_part_name_as_heading( elem.first.id(), 1 ),
2634  elem.second );
2635  }
2636  return desc;
2637 }

2658 bool Character::has_active_bionic( const bionic_id &b ) const
2659 {
2660  for( const bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
2661  if( i.id == b ) {
2662  if( i.is_safe_fuel_on() &&
2663  get_power_level() + 1_kJ > get_max_power_level() * std::min( 1.0f, i.get_safe_fuel_thresh() ) ) {
2664  // Inactive due to fuel treshold
2665  return false;
2666  }
2667 
2668  return ( i.powered && i.incapacitated_time == 0_turns );
2669  }
2670  }
2671  return false;
2672 }

2692 std::map<bodypart_id, int> Character::bionic_installation_issues( const bionic_id &bioid ) const

2700  if( lacked_slots > 0 ) {

2702  }
2703  }
2704  return issues;

2722 bionic_uid Character::add_bionic( const bionic_id &b, bionic_uid parent_uid,
2723  bool suppress_debug )
2724 {
2725  if( has_bionic( b ) && !b->dupes_allowed ) {
2726  if( !suppress_debug ) {
2727  debugmsg( "Tried to install bionic %s that is already installed!", b.c_str() );
2728  }
2729  return 0;
2730  }
2731 
2732  const units::energy pow_up = b->capacity;
2733  if( pow_up > 0_J ) {
2734  add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Increased storage capacity by %i." ),
2735  units::to_kilojoule( pow_up ) );
2736  }
2737 
2738  bionic_uid bio_uid = generate_bionic_uid();
2739 
2740  my_bionics->emplace_back( b, get_free_invlet( *this ), bio_uid, parent_uid );
2741  bionic &bio = my_bionics->back();
2742  if( bio.id->activated_on_install ) {
2743  activate_bionic( bio );
2744  }
2745 
2746  for( const bionic_id &inc_bid : b->included_bionics ) {
2747  add_bionic( inc_bid, bio_uid, suppress_debug );
2748  }
2749 
2750  for( const std::pair<const spell_id, int> &spell_pair : b->learned_spells ) {
2751  const spell_id learned_spell = spell_pair.first;
2752  if( learned_spell->spell_class != trait_NONE ) {
2753  const trait_id spell_class = learned_spell->spell_class;
2754  // spells you learn from a bionic overwrite the opposite spell class.
2755  // for best UX, include those spell classes in "canceled_mutations"
2756  if( !has_trait( spell_class ) ) {
2757  set_mutation( spell_class );
2758  on_mutation_gain( spell_class );
2759  add_msg_if_player( spell_class->desc() );
2760  }
2761  }
2762  if( !magic->knows_spell( learned_spell ) ) {
2763  magic->learn_spell( learned_spell, *this, true );
2764  }
2765  spell &known_spell = magic->get_spell( learned_spell );
2766  // spells you learn from installing a bionic upgrade spells you know if they are the same
2767  if( known_spell.get_level() < spell_pair.second ) {
2768  known_spell.set_level( *this, spell_pair.second );
2769  }
2770  }
2771 
2772  for( const proficiency_id &learned : b->proficiencies ) {
2773  add_proficiency( learned );
2774  }
2775 
2776  for( const itype_id &pseudo : b->passive_pseudo_items ) {
2777  item tmparmor( pseudo );
2778  if( tmparmor.has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED ) ) {
2779  wear_item( tmparmor, false );
2780  }
2781  }
2782  bio_flag_cache.clear();
2783  invalidate_pseudo_items();
2784  update_bionic_power_capacity();
2785 
2786  calc_encumbrance();
2787  recalc_sight_limits();
2788  if( is_avatar() && has_flag( json_flag_ENHANCED_VISION ) ) {
2789  // enhanced vision counts as optics for overmap sight range.
2790  g->update_overmap_seen();
2791  }
2792  if( !b->enchantments.empty() ) {
2793  recalculate_enchantment_cache();
2794  }
2795  effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
2796 
2797  return bio_uid;
2798 }

2824 void Character::remove_bionic( const bionic &bio )
2825 {
2826  const bionic_uid bio_uid = bio.get_uid();
2827  std::optional<bionic *> bio_opt = find_bionic_by_uid( bio_uid );
2828  if( !bio_opt ) {
2829  debugmsg( "Tried to uninstall non-existent bionic with UID %d", bio_uid );
2830  return;
2831  }
2832 
2833  bionic_collection new_my_bionics;
2834  // any spells you should not forget due to still having a bionic installed that has it.
2835  std::set<spell_id> cbm_spells;
2836  for( bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
2837  // Linked bionics: if either is removed, the other is removed as well.
2838  if( i.get_uid() == bio_uid || i.get_parent_uid() == bio_uid ) {
2839  continue;
2840  }
2841 
2842  for( const std::pair<const spell_id, int> &spell_pair : i.id->learned_spells ) {
2843  cbm_spells.emplace( spell_pair.first );
2844  }
2845 
2846  new_my_bionics.push_back( i );
2847  }
2848 
2849  // any spells you learn from installing a bionic you forget.
2850  for( const std::pair<const spell_id, int> &spell_pair : bio.id->learned_spells ) {
2851  if( cbm_spells.count( spell_pair.first ) == 0 ) {
2852  magic->forget_spell( spell_pair.first );
2853  }
2854  }
2855 
2856  for( const proficiency_id &lost : bio.id->proficiencies ) {
2857  lose_proficiency( lost );
2858  }
2859 
2860  for( const itype_id &popped_armor : bio.id->passive_pseudo_items ) {
2861  remove_worn_items_with( [&]( item & armor ) {
2862  return armor.typeId() == popped_armor;
2863  } );
2864  }
2865 
2866  const bool has_enchantments = !bio.id->enchantments.empty();
2867  *my_bionics = new_my_bionics;
2868  bio_flag_cache.clear();
2869  update_last_bionic_uid();
2870  invalidate_pseudo_items();
2871  update_bionic_power_capacity();
2872  calc_encumbrance();
2873  recalc_sight_limits();
2874  if( has_enchantments ) {
2875  recalculate_enchantment_cache();
2876  }
2877  // clean up any changes from bionic limbs
2878  recalculate_bodyparts();
2879  effect_on_conditions::process_reactivate( *this );
2880 }

3118 static bionic_id migrate_bionic_id( const bionic_id &original )
3119 {
3120  bionic_id bid = original;
3121 
3122  // limit up to 10 migrations per bionic (guard in case of accidental loops)
3123  for( int i = 0; i < 10; i++ ) {
3124  const auto &migration_it = bionic_data::migrations.find( bid );
3125  if( migration_it == bionic_data::migrations.cend() ) {
3126  break;
3127  }
3128  bid = migration_it->second;
3129  }
3130 
3131  if( bid != original ) {
3132  DebugLog( D_WARNING, D_MAIN ) << "Migrating bionic with id " << original.str() << " to " <<
3133  bid.str();
3134  }
3135 
3136  return bid;
3137 }

3139 void bionic::deserialize( const JsonObject &jo )
3140 {
3141  id = migrate_bionic_id( bionic_id( jo.get_string( "id" ) ) );
3142  if( !id.is_valid() ) {
3143  debugmsg( "deserialized bionic id '%s' doesn't exist and has no migration", id.str() );
3144  id = bionic_id::NULL_ID(); // remove it
3145  }
3146  if( id.is_null() ) {
3147  jo.allow_omitted_members();
3148  return; // obsoleted bionics migrated to bionic_id::NULL_ID ids
3149  }
3150  invlet = jo.get_int( "invlet" );
3151  powered = jo.get_bool( "powered" );
3152 
3153  //Remove After 0.G
3154  if( jo.has_int( "charge" ) ) {
3155  charge_timer = time_duration::from_turns( jo.get_int( "charge" ) );
3156  } else {
3157  jo.read( "charge_timer", charge_timer );
3158  }
3159 
3160  if( jo.has_int( "incapacitated_time" ) ) {
3161  incapacitated_time = 1_turns * jo.get_int( "incapacitated_time" );
3162  }
3163  if( jo.has_float( "safe_fuel_threshold" ) ) {
3164  safe_fuel_threshold = jo.get_float( "safe_fuel_threshold" );
3165  }
3166  if( jo.has_bool( "show_sprite" ) ) {
3167  show_sprite = jo.get_bool( "show_sprite" );
3168  }
3169  if( jo.has_array( "bionic_tags" ) ) {
3170  for( const std::string line : jo.get_array( "bionic_tags" ) ) {
3171  bionic_tags.insert( line );
3172  }
3173  }
3174 
3175  if( jo.has_int( "bionic_uid" ) ) {
3176  uid = jo.get_int( "bionic_uid" );
3177  }
3178 
3179  if( jo.has_int( "parent_uid" ) ) {
3180  parent_uid = jo.get_int( "parent_uid" );
3181  }
3182 
3183  if( jo.has_member( "weapon" ) ) {
3184  jo.read( "weapon", weapon, true );
3185  }
3186 
3187  // Suppress errors when loading old games
3188  // TODO: add old ammo to new weapon?
3189  if( jo.has_string( "ammo_loaded" ) ) {
3190  jo.get_string( "ammo_loaded" );
3191  }
3192  if( jo.has_int( "ammo_count" ) ) {
3193  jo.get_int( "ammo_count" );
3194  }
3195 
3196  initialize_pseudo_items();
3197 }

3309 std::vector<item *> Character::get_bionic_fuels( const bionic_id &bio )
3310 {
3311  std::vector<item *> stored_fuels;
3312 
3313  for( item_location it : top_items_loc() ) {
3314  if( !it->has_flag( flag_BIONIC_FUEL_SOURCE ) ) {
3315  continue;
3316  }
3317  for( const material_id &mat : bio->fuel_opts ) {
3318  if( it->ammo_remaining() && it->first_ammo().made_of( mat ) ) {
3319  // Ammo from magazines
3320  stored_fuels.emplace_back( it.get_item() );
3321  } else {
3322  for( item *cit : it->all_items_top() ) {
3323  // Fuel from containers
3324  if( cit->made_of( mat ) ) {
3325  stored_fuels.emplace_back( it.get_item() );
3326  break;
3327  }
3328  }
3329  }
3330  }
3331  }
3332 
3333  return stored_fuels;
3334 }
3335 
3336 std::vector<item *> Character::get_cable_ups()
3337 {
3338  std::vector<item *> stored_fuels;
3339 
3340  int n = cache_get_items_with( flag_CABLE_SPOOL, []( const item & it ) {
3341  return it.link_has_states( link_state::ups, link_state::bio_cable );
3342  } ).size();
3343  if( n == 0 ) {
3344  return stored_fuels;
3345  }
3346 
3347  // There is no way to check which cable is connected to which ups
3348  // So if there are multiple cables and some of them are only partially connected this may add wrong ups
3349  for( item_location it : all_items_loc() ) {
3350  if( it->has_flag( flag_IS_UPS ) && it->get_var( "cable" ) == "plugged_in" &&
3351  it->ammo_remaining() ) {
3352  stored_fuels.emplace_back( it.get_item() );
3353  n--;
3354  }
3355  if( n == 0 ) {
3356  break;
3357  }
3358  }
3359 
3360  if( n > 0 && weapon.has_flag( flag_IS_UPS ) && weapon.get_var( "cable" ) == "plugged_in" &&
3361  weapon.ammo_remaining() ) {
3362  stored_fuels.emplace_back( &weapon.first_ammo() );
3363  }
3364 
3365  return stored_fuels;
3366 }
3367 
3368 std::vector<item *> Character::get_cable_solar()
3369 {
3370  std::vector<item *> solar_sources;
3371 
3372  int n = cache_get_items_with( flag_CABLE_SPOOL, []( const item & it ) {
3373  return it.link_has_states( link_state::solarpack, link_state::bio_cable );
3374  } ).size();
3375  if( n == 0 ) {
3376  return solar_sources;
3377  }
3378 
3379  // There is no way to check which cable is connected to which solar pack
3380  // So if there are multiple cables and some of them are only partially connected this may add wrong solar pack
3381  for( item_location it : all_items_loc() ) {
3382  if( it->has_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON ) && it->get_var( "cable" ) == "plugged_in" ) {
3383  solar_sources.emplace_back( it.get_item() );
3384  n--;
3385  }
3386  if( n == 0 ) {
3387  break;
3388  }
3389  }
3390 
3391  if( n > 0 && weapon.has_flag( flag_SOLARPACK_ON ) && weapon.get_var( "cable" ) == "plugged_in" ) {
3392  solar_sources.emplace_back( &weapon );
3393  }
3394 
3395  return solar_sources;
3396 }

3398 std::vector<vehicle *> Character::get_cable_vehicle() const
3399 {
3400  std::vector<vehicle *> remote_vehicles;
3401 
3402  std::vector<const item *> cables = cache_get_items_with( flag_CABLE_SPOOL,
3403  []( const item & it ) {
3404  return it.link_has_state( link_state::bio_cable ) &&
3405  ( it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_battery ) ||
3406  it.link_has_state( link_state::vehicle_port ) );
3407  } );
3408  int n = cables.size();
3409  if( n == 0 ) {
3410  return remote_vehicles;
3411  }
3412 
3413  map &here = get_map();
3414 
3415  for( const item *cable : cables ) {
3416  if( cable->link().t_veh ) {
3417  remote_vehicles.emplace_back( cable->link().t_veh.get() );
3418  } else {
3419  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( cable->link().t_abs_pos );
3420  if( vp ) {
3421  remote_vehicles.emplace_back( &vp->vehicle() );
3422  }
3423  }
3424  }
3425 
3426  return remote_vehicles;
3427 }
